story:
SHE CAME FROM AFAR


This novel was born out of the amazing experience I had with God. God spoke to me. I listened (though it took years). Wouldn't you think if God spoke to you, you would immediately heed his word?! Note to myself for next time (of course I never anticipated a first time)! It sounds unbelievable, right? But it's true. This story will appeal to anyone interested in spiritual experiences, adoptive or prospective adoptive parent (s), and to anyone who enjoys a heartwarming adventure.

The adoption landscape is a moving target, so this is certainly a helpful read. Sibling documentation is light on the subject of transracial adoption, so this too may provide additional insights. Sometimes we underestimate the healing power of the sibling bond. Those bonds were instrumental in the many months of physical and emotional recovery for two sisters, twins of the heart (in this story). 

I have two sons, ages ten and seven. I have two daughters, who are both five! The girls are just two months apart, one biological, one adopted from the beautiful country of Ethiopia. Our family grew by way of divine intervention (yours did too). Three of my four kids almost didn't make it (literally), but we're fortunately all healthy and blissful today. 

For those of you who already know this story, you encouraged me to finally write it. My style is unfiltered; I am not fluffy nor afraid of controversy. I'm driven by compassion and responsibility regardless of risk. I swim upstream.

By helping to fund this straightforward 200 page book (paperback & ebook expected release on Amazon & Kindle, 8/2015) from the final editorial phase, to marketing design, publishing, and distribution you are helping to achieve an honest account and discussion of: 

  • Grace And Angels
  • Race And Gender
  • Loss And Grief
  • Joy And Hope
  • Tackling Tough Q's About Adoption
  • What Your Adoptive Child Needs From You
  • The Power of Global Outreach and What You Can Do 

My Trading Card:

Courtney Lindberg

Raised in Southern California. BRUIN. Met hubby in the Bahamas, happily married for 15 years. I'm 39, efficient mom of 4, wife of 1, based in Northern California. I am a vegetarian, Starbucksian, and proud parent who really needs your help to fund this book!  Thanks for your support however small, it really means the world to me. Give up one cup of joe to help me launch? Tell a few friends? I appreciate your virtual love.

Thank you for visiting. 10% of any proceeds from my book will be donated to: The Mossy Foot Project, in Ethiopia to continue their efforts in providing ongoing patient care and education.

HELP ME BRING IT HOME

Pass on this campaign, please, oh please I would be so grateful. Questions? Comments? I would be happy to hear from you.

• Share this campaign with as many friends and family as possible

• Share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Google+, etc.


FAQ:

For the Perks, Do you ship outside the USA or Canada?

Yes! Please add $10 to cover all shipments outside the USA and Canada.

story:
THE GLOBAL PUBLISHER OF THE ULTIMATED GUIDE TO LEARN HOW TO LIVE IN A BETTER WAY BY RESPECTING THE NATURE.

We are a team of writers who want to realize a green book to give people more choices and explanations about the respect of the environment, proposing a model of sustainable development. The model is focused on the principle of improving the quality of human life by living in harmony with the ecosystems that sustain us, also educating people to the reduction of waste and the development of new technologies.

For the first time a book includes information, advices and strategies to reduce our global impact and educate new generations. In fact it’s a collection of concrete explanation and suggestions about a new lifestyle full of green and smart actions for reduce the pollution, optimize the use of the resources and so the amount of your bills. Waste energy is not simply the same as wasting your money. Change is possible and it’s not so hard.

What makes this book interesting?

  • It gives you many hints to live better by reducing the human impact on Nature;
  • It gives you tools for save money by reducing the amount of energy consumption in your home life.

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to publish the book as soon as possible, in this way many people will soon begin to change their habits. So we need $25,000 of funding to publish and promote the project.

CHOOSE YOUR PERK

  • Thank you You will get a personal email to say Thank you for supporting this project.
  • “Social” Thank you  You will get a Thank you message on your social network account. Tell your friends that you are a philanthropist.
  • Limited Edition Canvas  Receive a signed limited edition Canvas with the hero of our guide.
  • Became a Supporter   Be a part of our community and see your name on the book website as a supporter.
  • Digital Copy  You will get a copy of the guide in e-book format, emailed to you as Indiegogo supporters before anyone else.
  • Support with Style  Receive a t-shirt with abook's illustration. We’ll contact you for the right size at the end of the campaign.
  • A copy at your home  Receive a copy of your book at your home at the end of the campaign. We’ll contact you for the shipping address.
  • Your name printed on the book  You will receive a signed copy with your name in the thank-you on the first page as sign of your support.
  • Choose your language   Choice your favorite or native language and receive your translated copy of the guide.
  • Italian nature  Receive a complete package of ticket for Italian monuments, nature parks and oasis at an Italian region of your choice for two people.
  • Travel in Italy Make a trip to Italy at our expense. Receive a complete package for two people includes: travel, stay, food and many activities at museums and nature parks.

Other Ways You Can Help

Tell your friends and your family, or make noise about our campaign on Social Network

FAQ

1.  Why donate to this project?

If you want to give your help to a book that offers a cultural change for a new approach to everyday life, with new strategies.

2.  What can I do for the world and future generations?

Donating to “One dollar for the nature” you’ll see a book that achieves to cities and into communities, schools, and so on. So, if you wanna see a project that changes the world and protects the nature and its biodiversity with diligence and unity, this is your project too.

3. What does your donation support?

We will take the resources to print the book and to work on the project for a year, for a total of 25.000$. But you donation is important because with your help we hope to make the difference. So, you are not only supporting the printing, you are fighting with us for a better world.

story:
I have spent a lifetime working with the mentally ill, vulnerable women, war veterans, the infirm, neglected, and the survivors of sexual violence.  I have also written and organized against the prejudices and fears the homeless and mentally ill suffer from.  I have used these experiences to write nine novels, six screenplays and a nonfcition.  I have decided that my writings are my next attempt to broaden the fight, not only for the dignity of the poor but their very lives.  So many are shunted to the streets and are expected to quietly die---unseen and uncared for.  This must come to an end.

                               THERE MUST BE HONOR

This book is a collection of my writings interwoven with my autobiography.  I plan to use these funds to launch a media campaign via iUniverse about this book.  With full funding they will run a co-op add in the New York Times Book Review, conduct a social media campaign and send a press release to 500 media outlets.  I plan to then publicize my two novels: Shattered Dreams, A Story of the Streets and China White.  I will then use the success of all three books to secure an agent for my other nonpublished novels and screenplays.  I strongly believe that the way to begin a national dialogue on the disgrace of homelessness and Third World poverty is via my writings.  The written word can connect the emotional truth to the reader.  But all this---including the fight for justice for the homeless and poor depends on getting my works before the public. If you can't contibute you can tell others of my needs and about my writings.  You can also voluteer at a shelter and even more important demand that the homeless, the mentally ill and all who find the streets home be treated with respect and compassion.  Please see my bio below for my credentials.  Thank you for your help.

Ken Williams

 

                                                 Bio

I worked as a social worker for the homeless in Santa Barbara Ca. for over thirty-five years.  I am also a writer for noozhawkcom but all local media have carried my articles.  As a social worker I won numerous awards for my work on behalf of the homeless and poor:

 *Certificate of Appreciation, Housing Authority, City of Santa Barbara, 2012

*A.C.L.U. Civil Rights Hero Award, 2010

*National Association of Social Workers California, Public Citizen of the Year 2010

*Certificate of Special Congressional Recognition, 2008

*Mental Health Association Award of Merit

* Community Service Honoree of the Year, 2005, NASW

*County of Santa Barbara Recognition Proclamation

*State Senate of California - Certificate of Recognition

*South Coast Coordinating Council Distinguished Service Award

*Service Employees International Union, 535 - Award of Merit

*National Council on Alcoholism and Drug Abuse Award of Merit

*Catholic Charities Individual Service - Award of Appreciation

*A.C.L.U. Distinguished Service Award

*California Legislative Assembly - Award of Merit

*The Independent’s Local Hero Award

*County of Santa Barbara Child Friendly Award

*Santa Barbara Neighborhood Clinics Healthcare Hero-1998

*Certificate of Appreciation, Salvation Army, September 2003

I served in combat with the 9th Marines---The Walking Dead in Vietnam.

story:
Thank You!!! 

Thank you! I have reached the minimum goal. The generous outpouring of support - not only financially - but verbally and emotionally - has been overwhelming.

Does it mean we're done? No way! The campaign continues for another 5 days. You can still contribute, don't stop the good intentions! What will happen to the money? When I set up the campaign, I chose the lowest budget possible, I factored the lowest figures. Now it's time to set the stretching goals! I am considering and exploring the possibility of a print edition instead of an e-book. That would imply higher expenses for the manuscript editing, cover layout and graphic design and so on. I have to be realistic though. So if that doesn't come through, there are lots of projects that could benefit form the donation of the difference. Please continue to contribute generously and to spread the word far and wide!


What's this all about? 


My name is Sinziana Carstocea, I am Romanian and I hold a PhD in social and political sciences from Université libre de Bruxelles in Belgium. The seeds for this project are to be found in the dissertation I presented for this title, entitled La Roumanie – du placard à la libération. Eléments pour une histoire socio-politique des revendications homosexuelles dans une société post-communiste. Yes, the fundation for writing the history of Romanian LGBT (lesbians, gays, bisexuals, transsexuals) exists already, an account of aproximatevely 400 pages in French, which I plan to translate, restore, update and include into a more comprehensive English version.

The dissertation received jury's unanimous recommendation for publishing. A twist of fate made in such a way that it has never turned into a book. Translating this story in English would make it available to a larger and more concerned audience and give it the visibility it deserves.  Let's make it happen!


More exactly... 


This is a one of kind project. It is not only groundbreaking, original, and audacious, it is food for thought, it is also entertaining, thrilling, and a good read! 

For decades, all consensual relations between same-sex adults were forbidden and number of homosexuals sent to prison. Today same-sex relationships are no longer a matter a criminal law and Romania has an elaborate legal framework to combat discrimination. After years of struggling with religious and moral conservatism, despite a weak associative sector, Romania decriminalized homosexual acts in 2001, as required in order to meet human rights standards of European institutions. A remarkably rapid change, compared to the decades needed for such changes to occur in Western Europe and North America, yet, compared to other post-communist countries, it's been a long controversy going through endless adversity. The processes behind this change constitute the heart of the matter of my account. 

A lot of people might find the read rewarding. On the one hand, it is a unique reference that adds a page to the LGBT history, which is overall in the making, and it contributes to the development of fruitful scientific dialogue in the field of LGBT studies. Due to its multidisciplinary nature, historians, sociologists, political scientists, anthropologists or journalists might find an interest in reading it. On the other hand, not only Romanian or Easter European, but LGBT people all over the world would find a fragment of their universe, maybe an entry to speculate on personal issues or challenges. Last but not least, this story could present a real appeal to any person who likes reading: this account provides information not easily found elsewhere and it does so in an easily accessible fashion, the main actors become passionate and complex characters and the events unfold earnestly. 


Why this campaign?


Writing my dissertation in French took me approximately six months, once I had all the material gathered and reading reports finalized. I anticipate to be able to accomplish the project in about 4 months, being that I will have not only to translate, but entirely rewrite some parts. When I started my research back in 2001, the subject was still very sensitive in Romania. All these years later, information is more widely available; a lot more people started to assume their orientation and openly talk about their experiences. I plan to get in touch and talk with them personally. I expect having to re-contact some of the persons I already interviewed and complete their initial account.


Were does the money go?

  • Proofreading - while I am fluent in English and I plan to re-write and translate the story myself, I am not a native speaker; proofreading, corrections and editing are much needed;
  • Ebook conversion – paying for prefessional conversion; the ebook will be then available online for free;
  • Research expenses – travel to interview places, phone bills (I plan to use voice-over internet protocols whenever possible), library permit, photocopying, administering questionnaires etc.
  • All the taxes and fees.

If I manage to restrict my spendings under the initial estimated amount, the difference will be donated to an association promoting LGBT rights in Romania. If my goal is exceeded, I am taking into consideration finding solutions for publishing a "real book" (that always seems to have more impact somehow). 


Rewards? 


Inspired by Gilbert Baker's original eight-stripe version from 1978, I designed a RAINBOW of perks. Besides, I can only hope you'll get the satisfaction of helping, of contributing to a great project, and participating to writing history! You can contribute in any currency, PayPal will take care of the rest. 

*** You don't need a PayPal account to contribute *** 

*** It's not mandatory to claim a perk ***

PS. I am open to suggestions, if you have a great idea of a perk you'd like me to add, then please suggest it!

 

Other Ways You Can Help


If you're unable to contribute financially to this campaign, there are other ways you can help:

  •  if you are a native speaker and have some experience with editing, you could offer to review a chapter of the book;
  •  if you have witnessed or have been involved in any way in this story, you could participate with a contribution yourslef; a short account of the events in your view or only on an episode. Otherwise you could simply answer a few questions on the topic that I will send to you and then integrate into the final product;
  • if you know someone who's closely witnessed or has been actively involved in this story, you can spread the word and maybe they would like to contribute with an account.

Please spread the word to anybody you might consider receptive and willing to help! 


Thank You! 


Thank you for contributing to my campaign! Every little helps! No amount is too small and I am grateful for your contribution of any kind. 

Thank you to the person who took this picture at the first "Gay Pride" type event in Bucharest. I don't know your name and I hope I am not breaching any copy right! 

Many thanks to my friends Elena and Razvan who first talked about this platform! I hope my project will be at least as successful as the one they told me about :) 

All my gratitude to all the people back home who actually lived this history I am only writing about...

if you know someone who's closely
witnessed or has been actively involved in this story, you can spread
the word and maybe they would like to contribute with an account.



Please spread the word to anybody
you might consider receptive and willing to help! 

Thank You! 

Thank you for contributing to my
campaign! Every little helps! No amount is too small and I am
grateful for your contribution of any kind. 
Thank you to the person who took this
picture at the first "Gay Pride" type event in Bucharest. I
don't know your name and I hope I am not breaching any copy right! 
Many thanks to my friends Elena and
Razvan who first talked about this platform! I hope my project will
be at least as successful as the one they told me about :) 
All my gratitude to all the people back
home who actually lived this history I am only writing about...

story:
Thanks for your overwhelming support! Any donations in excess of what we need for legal costs will go to supporting refugees

Donation bank account (for those without paypal): NL42 ABNA 0441 4778 44

* for english see below *

Feministen voor verzetsspray vragen jullie (financiële)  steun.

Op zaterdag 23 januari zijn wij, 10 vrouwen van alle leeftijden, gearresteerd in Spijkenisse bij de actie “Feministen voor verzetsspray”. Wilders was in Spijkenisse om nep-pepperspray uit te delen aan vrouwen om zich te beschermen tegen asielzoekers die in Wilders woorden, “islamistische testosteronbommen” zijn.

Wij spraken ons vreedzaam uit tegen Wilders’ cynische inzet van vrouwenrechten om zijn agenda van racisme, uitsluiting en haatzaaien tegen migranten, moslims en vluchtelingen aan te jagen. De politie ontnam ons het recht om te spreken terwijl Wilders’ aanhangers alle ruimte kregen om ons seksistische beledigen toe te schreeuwen. Wij weigerden ons de identiferen aan de politie omdat zij geen grond hadden om dit eisen, en voldoen aan die eis effectief een einde zou maken aan onze actie. Hierom werden wij aangehouden en uren vastgehouden, een vrouw zelfs gedurende de hele nacht. Wij zijn beboet voor het niet opvolgen van een ambtelijk bevel en het weigeren ons (direct) te identificeren.

Onze advocaat Willem Jebbink is van mening dat beide aanklachten ongegrond zijn. Wij zullen de arrestatie en deze boetes dan ook aanvechten voor de rechter. Willem Jebbink vertegenwoordigt ons tegen een gereduceerd tarief.

Wij hebben er vertrouwen in dat de zaak tegen ons geseponeerd zal worden en de boetes kwijtgescholden. In de tussentijd hebben wij echter wel wat geld nodig om ons te verdedigen tegen deze onterechte arrestatie en boetes. Hiervoor hebben wij (ongeveer) 1280 euro nodig en vragen daarom jullie (financiële) steun!

Elke donatie, klein en groot, wordt zeer gewaardeerd! 

Wanneer wij, zoals wij verwachten, worden vrijgesproken zullen ook de juridische kosten worden kwijtgescholden. Wij zullen er natuurlijk voor zorgen dat het gedoneerde geld goed terecht komt bij de vluchtelingen die wij welkom heten.

Naast jullie financiële steun hopen wij vooral dat jullie ons willen steunen in actie; tegen racisme, voor feminisme en solidariteit met vluchtelingen.

Op 6 februari om 13:00 bij de Dokwerker in Amsterdam zullen wij er zijn om tegen de racistische organisatie PEGIDA te demonstreren en hopen jullie daar in grote getalen te zien!

Support feminists against Geert Wilders!

Feminists for “verzetsspray” need your (financial) support.

On Saturday January 23rd we, 10 women of all ages, were arrested in Spijkenisse at the protest “Feminists for verzetsspray”. Wilders was in Spijkenisse to hand out fake pepper spray to women to protect themselves against asylum seekers who, in Wilders words, are “Islamic testosterone bombs”.

We peacefully spoke out against Wilders’ cynical use of women’s rights to further his agenda of racism, exclusion and fearmongering against migrants, Muslims and refugees. The police infringed upon our right to free speech, while Wilders’ supporters were allowed to hurl sexist abuse at us. We refused to identify ourselves to the police because they had no grounds to demand this, and had we complied with this demand it would have effectively ended our protest. Because of this refusal we were detained and were held for hours, and one women was even held overnight. We have been fined for not complying with police orders and failure to identify ourselves (on the spot).

Our lawyer Willem Jebbink considers both charges to be unfounded. We will contest the arrest and these fines before a judge. Willem Jebbink is representing us at a reduced tariff.

We are confident that all charges and fines against us will be dropped. However, in the meantime we do need some money to defend ourselves against these unjustified arrests and fines. We need approximately 1280 euros and therefore are asking for your (financial) support!

Every donation, great and small, will be much appreciated!

When we are acquitted, as we anticipate, we will also be reimbursed for all legal costs. Of course we shall make sure that any donated money goes toward welcoming and relieving the suffering of refugees.

Apart from your financial support we especially hope you will support us in action; against racism, for feminism and in solidarity with refuges.

On February 6th at 13:00 at the Dokwerker in Amsterdam we will be there to march against the presence of the racist organization PEGIDA in Amsterdam and hope to see many of you there.

story:
"Across from Swong bridge, Birham road, Mississippi

Blunt footsteps echoed within the walls of the dark building. A tall shadow hovered up the stairs, slowly but steadily, searching its surroundings, weighing the possibilities, with so many doors in the corridor, unsure where to start from. "Tender flesh makes me so eager, run away or be my dinner."

Out of the pocket of black tailored pants appeared a long white hand, moving across the dusty banister, caressing it.  The creature kept ascending slowly up the stairs when suddenly a faint sound made it stop on its tracks.  It turned around quietly to check where the sound came from and reckoned it came from behind the first door to the right. "If I do it fast enough, no one will notice…." He hesitated.

He is on a mission. He has to get rid of the Interworld Border Gatekeeper, and he hasn't got a moment to waste, but the mesmerizing scent of something so fresh and energizing seeped through his nostrils to his veins and straight to his heart which was now beating wildly, tempting him mercilessly.

The sound was that of a crying maid which came to a sudden halt, no doubt silenced by fear. He imagined her warm and soft skin, waiting for him within such small distance. His stomach raged with hunger. It's been quite a while since he last afforded himself the taste of raw virginal flesh.  He became tense and immobile like a wild beast lurking in the dark, waiting to swoop on its prey. He turned his bald white head to the door and noticed a bundle of garlic cloves hanging from the lintel. A narrow crack began to widen in the center of the white face, from which glimpsed several rows of long sharp fangs. He thrusted his bony fingers into the lock and turned it open; then he kicked the door and heard a scream from inside the room.

The door broke off its hinges and hit the floor with a loud thud, releasing a thick cloud of dust. Overcome by feverish excitement, he charged into the room noticing a figure nimbly disappearing at the end of the corridor. Without thinking twice, he ran towards the end of the hall, breathing heavily, just in time to prevent the door from slamming in his face. The young girl screamed again and managed to slide a few steps away from him, wailing and shaking with terror on the floor. She covered her face with her arms, looking like a helpless porcelain doll. 

The creature had nothing on its mind apart from settling his stomach. He approached her and grabbed her arm forcefully. She was so thin he could squeeze her to death effortlessly. He propped her up with his long arm and pressed her back against the window, moving his face closer to hers.

Her eyes were still fixed upon the creature, wide open with horror. She could not control the tears that trickled down her trembling lips. He was very tall compared to her, wearing an austere dark gray suite which emphasized his slim and shockingly deformed body. His face looked like a white screen with neither/no eyes, nose or mouth. However, as he got closer to her, the girl could discern some faint facial features. The eye sockets seemed so deep and had no pupils. Where his mouth was supposed to be a thin crack appeared again, exposing his sharp fangs. 

"My name……is Dmonrogue," said the creature slowly, "and you are, most likely, one of these persecuted brats." He let out a snarl and made for the main artery which bulged from the gir's neck. "Please…." She tearfully begged.

The creature indulged himself on the sweet scent that filled his nostrils. "Please….what?" He asked, prolonging the question. "Please don't hurt me," sobbed the girl. A sickening and hungry smile spread across his face exposing all of his fangs; his foul breath made her hairs stand up. 

"It is, no doubt, less enjoyable when the victim is unaware of the true reason which brings us to meet," he hissed. Then he stormed upon her in an animalistic amok. A terrible shriek sounded and escaped the window with the whistle of the cold wind. The whole street seemed to twist and twang with silent torturing. If someone had the courage to peek through the window or press an ear against the door, he could have easily imagined the expression on the poor girl's face a moment before she was gone.


.מעבר לסויינג ברידג', רחוב ביראם, מיסיסיפי.
צעדים עמומים הדהדו בין קירותיו של הבניין החשוך.
צל גבוה ריחף במעלה המדרגות באטיות קצובה, תר וסורק את החלל סביבו.

כל כך הרבה דלתות עומדות לרשותו, הוא לא בטוח איפה הוא רוצה להתחיל.

  "בשר רך, בשר טרי, ברח מהר, או שתסתיים בפי..." מלמל חרש. 

יד ארוכה ולבנה הגיחה מתוך כיס מכנסיים שחורים מחויטים וליטפה את המעקה המאובק. 

היצור המשיך לטפס באטיות במעלה המדרגות,כשלפתע נשמע קול חרישי והוא נעמד דום. 

הוא הסתובב לאט ובשקט לעבר מקור הציוץ. זה הגיח מבעד לדלת שמימינו,אם יעשה את זה מהר, אף אחד לא ידע מזה. הוא היסס. 

יש לו משימה לבצע. עליו להיפטר משומר גבול העולמות ואסור לו לבזבז זמן מיותר, אך הריח המשכר של משהו אנרגטי וטרי שזרם בעורקיו דרך הלב הפועם במהירות כה רבה היה... מפתה עד מוות.
הקול נשמע כשל התייפחות נערה, שמיד הושתק מפחד. 

לבו הלם בעצמה כשדמיין את עורה הרך והחם מחכה לו במרחק כה קצר. בטנו געשה מרוב רעב, כבר עבר המון זמן מאז שהרשה לעצמו בשר טרי. הוא נדרך בדממה מוחלטת כשל חיית פרא לפני הזינוק אל טרפה. ראשו הקירח נטה לעבר הדלת הימנית, 

והוא הבחין במשהו שהיה תלוי מעל המשקוף. היה זה צרור של ראשי שום. סדק דקיק החל להתרחב במרכז פניו של היצור וחשף שורות של שיניים ארוכות וחדות. הוא פלט צחוק גבוה וקר.

 אז תושבי העיר הזאת עדיין לא למדו לקח... הוא שרבב את אצבעותיו הארוכות אל תוך המנעול וסובב אותן עד שנשמע צליל פתיחה. אחר כך בעט בחזקה בדלת והיא התפוצצה ברעש גדול. 

צרחה נשמעה מתוך הדירה. דחף בלתי נשלט התעורר בו והוא הסתער פנימה כמו נחש קוברה.
מתוך האבק שעלה כשבעט בדלת, הבחין בדמות שנעלמת בקצה המסדרון. בזינוק קדימה, בלי לחשוב פעמיים, מתנשף ומתנשם בהתרגשות, 

הוא הגיע לקצה המסדרון ובעט בעצמה בדלת שכמעט ננעלה לפניו – טראח! הנערה צרחה בעודה נהדפת לאחור בעוצמה והחליקה כמה מטרים רחוק ממנו. מייבבת ורועדת מפחד על הרצפה, היא כיסתה את פניה במרפקיה ונראתה כמו בובת חרסינה שברירית וחסרת אונים.
היצור לא חשב על שום דבר מלבד להשביע את רעבונו. הוא התקדם לעברה ותפס את זרועה בכוח.

 היא הייתה כל כך דקיקה שיכול היה למחוץ אותה למוות בלי להתאמץ. הוא הצמיד אותה לחלון בכוח והתקרב אליה לאט. מבטה ננעץ באימה ביצור ודמעות זלגו ללא שליטה על שפתיה הרועדות. 

לעומתה, הוא היה גבוה מאוד ולבש חליפה בצבע אפור כהה. גופו היה דקיק אך מאיים כל כך בצורתו המעוותת, פניו היו מסך לבן וריק, ללא עיניים אף או פה. ככל שהתקרב אליה, הבחינה בתווי פנים חלשים מאוד. משקעי העיניים היו עמוקים בבשר, ללא זכר לאישונים, במקום שהיה צריך להיות פה שוב נפער סדק צר שמתוכו בצבצו שיניים חדות.
"שמי... דמונרוג," אמר היצור באטיות, "ואת כנראה נרדפת מתועבת." הוא חרחר וקירב את פניו לעורק הראשי הבולט של הנערה.
"בבקשה..." היא התחננה בדמעות.
הוא התענג לרגע קצר על הריח המתוק שעלה באפו. "בבקשה... מה?" שאל באטיות.
"בבקשה, אל תפגע בי," יבבה הנערה.
שיניו היו פרושות בחיוך רעב והבל פיו המצחין גרם לשערותיה לסמור עוד יותר.

 "העניין, ללא כל ספק, מהנה פחות כשהקורבן עדיין לא יודע מי הוא," הוא לחשש כמו נחש והסתער עליה בחייתיות. 

באותו הרגע נפלטה מפיה צרחה נוראית שנישאה עם שריקת הרוח הקרה. כל הרחוב כאילו התעוות והתעקם בייסורים אילמים. אם למישהו היה די אומץ להציץ מבעד לחלון או להצמיד את אוזנו לדלת, יכול היה לדמיין את הבעת פניה של אותה נערה רגע לפני סופה.

 * * *

" Something dark is undermining  the peace of the universe ……. someone is killing  the guards of the worlds’  borders……….. painfully .”
 
“Song Lin noticed a strange phenomenon : Animals go insane   near her . Peter Pratchett sees huge  cats and starts to feel quesy . Claudia is praying on the torture table that they don’t  murder her friend Gaytan, and in the meantime the demons burst into the world and …………. there's no stopping them .”
 
Each and every one of these teens  has a special ability . Each and every one has enormous power with which they can restore peace to  the universe . The problem is that they  don't know by whom  they are being persecuted . And they have no idea how the prophecy will be completed . "

בפי..." מלמל חרש. יד ארוכה ולבנה הגיחה מתוך כיס מכנסיים שחורים מחויטים
וליטפה את המעקה המאובק. היצור המשיך לטפס באטיות במעלה המדרגות,כשלפתע
נשמע קול חרישי והוא נעמד דום. הוא הסתובב לאט ובשקט לעבר מקור הציוץ. זה הגיח
מבעד לדלת שמימינו,אם יעשה את זה מהר, אף אחד לא ידע
מזה. הוא היסס. יש לו משימה לבצע. עליו להיפטר משומר גבול העולמות ואסור לו לבזבז
זמן מיותר, אך הריח המשכר של משהו אנרגטי וטרי שזרם בעורקיו דרך הלב הפועם במהירות
כה רבה היה... מפתה עד מוות.הקול נשמע כשל התייפחות נערה, שמיד
הושתק מפחד. לבו הלם בעצמה כשדמיין את עורה הרך והחם מחכה לו במרחק כה קצר. בטנו
געשה מרוב רעב, כבר עבר המון זמן מאז שהרשה לעצמו בשר טרי. הוא נדרך בדממה מוחלטת
כשל חיית פרא לפני הזינוק אל טרפה. ראשו הקירח נטה לעבר הדלת הימנית, והוא הבחין
במשהו שהיה תלוי מעל המשקוף. היה זה צרור של ראשי שום. סדק דקיק החל להתרחב במרכז
פניו של היצור וחשף שורות של שיניים ארוכות וחדות. הוא פלט צחוק גבוה וקר. אז
תושבי העיר הזאת עדיין לא למדו לקח... הוא שרבב את אצבעותיו הארוכות אל תוך המנעול
וסובב אותן עד שנשמע צליל פתיחה. אחר כך בעט בחזקה בדלת והיא התפוצצה ברעש גדול. צרחה נשמעה מתוך הדירה. דחף בלתי נשלט התעורר בו והוא הסתער פנימה כמו נחש קוברה.מתוך האבק שעלה כשבעט בדלת, הבחין
בדמות שנעלמת בקצה המסדרון. בזינוק קדימה, בלי לחשוב פעמיים, מתנשף ומתנשם
בהתרגשות, הוא הגיע לקצה המסדרון ובעט בעצמה בדלת שכמעט ננעלה לפניו – טראח! הנערה
צרחה בעודה נהדפת לאחור בעוצמה והחליקה כמה מטרים רחוק ממנו. מייבבת ורועדת מפחד
על הרצפה, היא כיסתה את פניה במרפקיה ונראתה כמו בובת חרסינה שברירית וחסרת אונים.היצור לא חשב על שום דבר מלבד להשביע
את רעבונו. הוא התקדם לעברה ותפס את זרועה בכוח. היא הייתה כל כך דקיקה שיכול היה
למחוץ אותה למוות בלי להתאמץ. הוא הצמיד אותה לחלון בכוח והתקרב אליה לאט. מבטה
ננעץ באימה ביצור ודמעות זלגו ללא שליטה על שפתיה הרועדות. לעומתה, הוא היה גבוה
מאוד ולבש חליפה בצבע אפור כהה. גופו היה דקיק אך מאיים כל כך בצורתו המעוותת,
פניו היו מסך לבן וריק, ללא עיניים אף או פה. ככל שהתקרב אליה, הבחינה בתווי פנים
חלשים מאוד. משקעי העיניים היו עמוקים בבשר, ללא זכר לאישונים, במקום שהיה צריך להיות
פה שוב נפער סדק צר שמתוכו בצבצו שיניים חדות."שמי... דמונרוג," אמר
היצור באטיות, "ואת כנראה נרדפת מתועבת." הוא חרחר וקירב את פניו לעורק
הראשי הבולט של הנערה."בבקשה..." היא התחננה
בדמעות.הוא התענג לרגע קצר על הריח המתוק
שעלה באפו. "בבקשה... מה?" שאל באטיות."בבקשה, אל תפגע בי,"
יבבה הנערה.שיניו היו פרושות בחיוך רעב והבל
פיו המצחין גרם לשערותיה לסמור עוד יותר. "העניין, ללא כל ספק, מהנה פחות
כשהקורבן עדיין לא יודע מי הוא," הוא לחשש כמו נחש והסתער עליה בחייתיות. באותו
הרגע נפלטה מפיה צרחה נוראית שנישאה עם שריקת הרוח הקרה. כל הרחוב כאילו התעוות
והתעקם בייסורים אילמים. אם למישהו היה די אומץ להציץ מבעד לחלון או להצמיד את
אוזנו לדלת, יכול היה לדמיין את הבעת פניה של אותה נערה רגע לפני סופה. * * *" Something dark is undermining  the peace of the universe ……. someone is killing  the guards of the worlds’  borders……….. painfully .” “Song Lin noticed a strange phenomenon : Animals go insane   near her . Peter Pratchett sees huge  cats and starts to feel quesy . Claudia is praying on the torture table that they don’t  murder her friend Gaytan, and in the meantime the demons burst into the world and …………. there's no stopping them .” Each and every one of these teens  has a special ability . Each and every one has enormous power with which they can restore peace to  the universe . The problem is that they  don't know by whom  they are being persecuted . And they have no idea how the prophecy will be completed . "

story:
What is Dallas Youth Poets?

My name is, Joaquin Zihuatanejo, I am an award-winning teacher and poet from Dallas, Texas, and I have a dream that you can help bring to life.  My dream is to grow a program I have created into something large and life-affirming in scope and size.  Dallas Youth Poets is a non-profit organization in Dallas that seeks to provide inner-city youth poets with a safe space to meet and write and speak their truths. This program holds free writing and performance workshops throughout the year which culminate in a giant show in April (National Poetry Month) in which the 18 students who have been attending the most workshops and participating as poets and leaders in their community will compete for a chance to make the six-person 2015 Dallas Youth Poets team.  A team of youth performance poets that will travel during the summer to Houston to the Texas Youth Poetry Slam State Championship, then to Albuquerque for the Regional Green Chile Youth Poetry Slam Championship, and then to Atlanta, Georgia for the Brave New Voices National Youth Poetry Slam and Literary Festival.  As you can imagine, taking six youth poets from the inner city around the country and lodging and feeding them is an expensive endeavor, but together we can make it happen.  I believe this experience can help young people realize that they can write the wrongs of the world and that their voices matter, with your contribution, you can help me accomplish this.

What We Need 

  • $1500 Registration for Dallas Youth Poets to attend and compete at the Brave New Voices National Youth Poetry Slam (if we pay the early reduced rate in February) if we miss that deadline the registration goes up in cost
  • $1800 Flights for six students to and from Atlanta for Brave New Voices 
  • $600 Feeding six hungry teenagers two breakfast meals and two lunch meals and four dinners during the four-day BNV Festival
  • $1500 Flights for six students to travel to Albuquerque for the Regional Green Chile Invitational Youth Poetry Slam Championship
  • $500 Lodging for the three-day Regional Green Chile Invitational Youth Slam in Albuquerque. (Two rooms over three nights)
  • $600 Feeding six hungry teenagers breakfast, lunch, and dinner during the three-day literary festival and poetry slam in Albuquerque
  • $250 Cost of a minivan rental for the three-day literary festival and poetry slam in Albuquerque
  • $250 Cost of a minivan rental for the Texas Youth Poetry Slam State Championship in Houston, Texas
  • If we do not meet our goal in its entirety we will focus all of our energy and fundraising to help us get to Brave New Voices in Atlanta as our first priority.  

& What You Get

  • You as a sponsor of this beautiful movement that is Dallas Youth Poets get the satisfaction of knowing that you helped me create and grow a program that never charges a student or their parents one penny to be a part of our creative writing and performance poetry program.  You get to be a part of helping a young person realize just how powerful his or her voice is, and you get to help a student in the greater Dallas area realize that they are connected to a much larger world than their hood or barrio or suburb by giving them the chance to see parts of the country they otherwise might not get the chance to see, and meet youth poets from all parts of the world who like themselves have a story to tell.  And as you will see on the next page there are some pretty cool perks that go along with that donation that you give as well.
The Impact
  • The first year that Dallas Youth Poets existed, at the end of the year's program after teaching all those workshops and traveling with my students to literary festivals and youth poetry slams in Chicago, Albuquerque, and College Station, Texas, a young student said to me that this program had changed his life, that he could see now that his voice is powerful and that his truth mattered.  When a student says something like that to you, it stays with you forever.  I only get to travel with six students during the summer, but we have countless students come to our workshops every year.  Our program is designed to teach students to become active citizens for change.  It is designed to teach students to become passionate writers and performers.  I teach my students to press the pencil down hard when they write, so as to leave an impression on things they were not intending to impress.
  • This is our third year at Dallas Youth Poets.  In our two previous years, we have successfully taught hundreds of students in the greater Dallas area at our free creative writing and performance poetry workshops.  We have travelled with students to National, Regional and State Youth Poetry slam Competitions and have shown improvement in our rankings and scores each year.  But more than anything, we've taught young people in the greater Dallas area that their stories, their poems, their truths are sacred.  This is what we do at Dallas Youth Poets.

Risks & Challenges

  • At Dallas Youth Poets, our biggest hurdle is funding.  We can only do these astonishing things with our students if we have the actual funding to take them to New Mexico, or Georgia, or South Texas.  This is something we have faced every year, but through this campaign, and through our on the ground, grass roots funding campaigns we have met our goals for two years now going into our third year and we have no intention of slowing our efforts down.
  • One of the things that will help me to overcome all of the obstacles that I face as a Program Director is that we are in our third year now and actually have students who are not aging out of the program but aging up in the program into new leadership positions.  These 19 and 20 year old young adults are helping me with their social media skills to spread the good word.  They are also acting as my street poet team, getting the word out about who we are and what we do, as well as learning to facilitate workshops and in turn become the future leaders of this program.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that not everyone can give to our cause.  We understand that and respect it, but even if you can't give, you can help immensely just by sharing our campaign.  Let your friends on Facebook, Twitter and the like know about the great work we are doing at Dallas Youth Poets and more importantly let them know about the amazing students who have come through our program and said that this program has changed their lives for the better.  One of my favorite photos from our experience last year was a photo of one of our youth poets, Dakota, standing arm in arm with the youth poets from Cape Town, South Africa.  They would have never met, they would have never heard each other's poems and stories, they would have never shared their humanity with one another had it not been for this program.  By sharing this campaign, you can help us make this happen again for students in 2015.

story:
He is blogging with many pretty pictures. He need money to keep making blogging with pretty pictures.

100 dollars. American.

To upgrade to premium account. He run out of room on his free word press. He need 100 dollars.

www.jasonfredricgilbert.wordpress.com

You read blog, yes? Then you give money. Or else he no write blog. And then he sad.

Other moneys go to getting him drunk so he keep blogging word good.

And new camera. He break old camera lens taking picture of naked self.

And he putting new naked pictures of himself on new internet. Until it break.

You watch video now.

You send money?

story:
Who Am I?

I am a British photographer and author documenting the surviving Western genre movie sets in the American West.

My passion for the sets, the movies made there and the people who share a history with these iconic backdrops began during a trip to California in 2001. During that summer, I became interested in the history of the wild frontier, and in particular, Hollywood’s depiction of the West as myth, and its influence on the lasting romance we have with the Western genre.

What Am I Doing?

In 2005, the architecture of the movie sets caught my attention and I began photographing them. Once I started photographing these sets, I became interested in the histories behind each location. By 2012, it became apparent that my research was leading to the book project.

The book project has evolved from merely documenting the movie sets and their history to interviewing the owners, caretakers, set designers, directors, actors, stuntmen, and countless others who have come into contact with the sets.

The book chronicles this important aspect of the history and heritage of the west. Many of these western movie sets have already disappeared (2 whilst writing the book). The remaining movie sets need to be documented, along with the people who share their history. So far the book has many stories, and many more to tell. Time is of the essence, all the stories need to be told while the older generation of preservationists are still here to tell them.

What Am I looking to Fund?

Though printing of the book will be at a future date, this campaign will help advance the content of the book in a real and meaningful way, by helping me attend a once-in-a-lifetime event: The Lonesome Dove Reunion and Trail in Fort Worth, Texas, on March 30 and 31, 2016.

The iconic 1989 TV Western mini-series Lonesome Dove (based on the 1985 novel with the same name by Larry McMurtry) was filmed on four of the movie sets chronicled in my book, Alamo Village, Bonanza Creek Ranch, Cerro Pelon and Eaves Movie Ranch. Attendance at this event will help me deepen the scope and appeal of the book, while recording a major piece of Western movie set history.

The Lonesome Dove cast and crew will make special appearances, as well as attend panel discussions. This is my opportunity to gather personal, behind the scenes stories from the making of Lonesome Dove. I am in the process of making contact with cast and crew to set up interviews. One of my contacts is working to arrange an interview with Robert Duvall! So far I have secured tickets to all 5 panel discussions, where Robert Duvall, Tommy Lee Jones, Anjelica Huston, Diane Lane, Danny Glover, Ricky Schroder and Chris Cooper are due to attend, along with the directors, producers and art production team. Interviews have been arranged with Ricky Schroder (Newt Dobbs), Barry Corbin (Roscoe Brown), Director - Simon Wincer, Screen writer/Exec producer -  Bill Wittliff and Production Designer - Cary White, with more to follow...

To date the trips from the UK to the USA  to make the book project happen have been self funded (apart from a few much appreciated donations), but I've reached the point where I need your pledges to make the Lonesome Dove chapter a reality. The material gathered during this trip will make the book a definite read for film historians and Western fans alike.

How much is it going to cost?

The project will be fully funded at £2,500. This will cover:

Airfare/Travel Insurance - £824

Lodging -  £590

Car hire/Insurance/Petrol - £490

Daily Expenses - £350 

Campaign fees/perks - £270

What are the perks?

We have added a special perk for anyone attending the Lonesome Dove Reunion Trail who is without a ticket for the first sold out panel discussion. £100 - Are you ticket-less at the Lonesome Dove Trail in Fort Worth? Join me for coffee to learn about the western movie sets before my book is published and be my guest at the“Remembering Lonesome Dove” panel discussion on March 30, 2016. Share intimate moments with the cast and crew as they reminisce and tell stories from behind the scenes. With special appearances from Robert Duvall, Tommy Lee Jones, Ricky Schroder, Danny Glover and Chris Cooper (schedules permitting). Email me for more details.

£5 - A personal thank you postcard from my Southwestern collection of photographs sent from the Lonesome Dove Reunion & Trail.

£10 - A digital wallpaper image of your choice chosen from my website for personal use on a smartphone or iPhone. A personal thank you postcard from my Southwestern collection of photographs, sent from the Lonesome Dove Reunion & Trail.

£20 - A signed 5x7 photograph of your choice chosen from my website. A personal thank you postcard from my Southwestern collection of photographs, sent from the Lonesome Dove Reunion & Trail.

£25 - A set of 10 postcards (5 black and white, 5 colour) from my Southwestern collection of photographs, which includes movie set images made during the book project. A personal thank you postcard from my Southwestern collection of photographs, sent from the Lonesome Dove Reunion & Trail.

£50 - A signed 6x8 photograph of your choice chosen from my website. A set of 10 postcards (5 black and white, 5 colour) from my Southwestern collection of photographs, which includes movie set images made during the book project. A personal thank you postcard from my Southwestern collection of photographs, sent from the Lonesome Dove Reunion & Trail.

£50 - A signed 8x10 photograph of your choice chosen from my website. A personal thank you postcard from my Southwestern collection of photographs, sent from the Lonesome Dove Reunion & Trail.

£75 - A signed 8x10 photograph of your choice chosen from my website. A set of 10 postcards (5 black and white, 5 colour) from my Southwestern collection of photographs, which includes movie set images made during the book project. A personal thank you postcard from my Southwestern collection of photographs, sent from the Lonesome Dove Reunion Trail.

£100 - A signed 12x16 photograph of your choice chosen from my website. A personal thank you postcard from my Southwestern collection of photographs, sent from the Lonesome Dove Reunion & Trail.

£125 - A signed 12x16 photograph of your choice chosen from my website. A set of 10 postcards (5 black and white, 5 colour) from my Southwestern collection of photographs, which includes movie set images made during the book project. A personal thank you postcard from my Southwestern collection of photographs, sent from the Lonesome Dove Reunion Trail.

£500 - Join me next summer for an exclusive, VIP, behind the scenes tour of a New Mexico Western Movie Set. Arrangements to be made nearer the time. The visit needs to be arranged in between filming schedules.

Here are the images that make up my Southwestern postcard collection.

View my website for a choice of signed photographs -www.shirleytipping.com

All collected funds will go towards attending the Lonesome Dove Reunion & Trail in Fort Worth, Texas, as well as gathering the research for the Lonesome Dove chapter. Any funds pledged above the target will be used to photograph the remaining 3 movie sets I have still to document.


Other ways you can help.

If you are not able to contribute financially, I fully understand. If you like what I'm doing here, perhaps you can help in other ways?

·  Share this campaign using the Indiegogo share buttons!

·  Social media and email can be a wonderful thing, sharing the campaign on your Facebook page or emailing anyone you know who may be interested would be very much appreciated.

·  Sharing the Western Movie Sets Facebook Page will also enlighten people about the book project. Please feel free to contact me for any more information about the book or leave a comment on the FB Page.

the book in a real and meaningful way, by helping me attend a once-in-a-lifetime
event: The Lonesome Dove Reunion and Trail in Fort Worth, Texas, on March 30
and 31, 2016.
The iconic 1989 TV Western
mini-series Lonesome Dove (based on
the 1985 novel with the same name by Larry McMurtry) was filmed on four of the
movie sets chronicled in my book, Alamo Village, Bonanza Creek Ranch, Cerro
Pelon and Eaves Movie Ranch. Attendance at this event will help me deepen the
scope and appeal of the book, while recording a major piece of Western movie
set history. 
The Lonesome Dove cast
and crew will make special appearances, as well as attend panel discussions. This is my opportunity to gather personal, behind the scenes
stories from the making of Lonesome Dove. I am in the process of making contact
with cast and crew to set up interviews. One of my contacts is working to arrange
an interview with Robert Duvall! So far I have secured tickets to all 5 panel discussions, where Robert Duvall, Tommy Lee Jones, Anjelica Huston, Diane Lane, Danny Glover, Ricky Schroder and Chris Cooper are due to attend, along with the directors, producers and art production team. Interviews have been arranged with Ricky Schroder (Newt Dobbs), Barry Corbin (Roscoe Brown), Director - Simon Wincer, Screen writer/Exec producer -  Bill Wittliff and Production Designer - Cary White, with more to follow...

To date the trips from the UK to the USA  to make the book project happen have been self funded (apart from a few much appreciated 
donations), but I've reached the point where I need your pledges to make
the Lonesome Dove chapter a reality. The material gathered during this trip
will make the book a definite read for film historians and Western fans alike.How much is it going to cost?
The project will be
fully funded at £2,500. This will cover: 
Airfare/Travel
Insurance - £824 
Lodging -  £590
Car hire/Insurance/Petrol
- £490
Daily Expenses -
£350  
Campaign fees/perks -
£270
What are the perks?We have added a special perk for anyone attending the Lonesome Dove Reunion Trail who is without a ticket for the first sold out panel discussion. £100 - Are you ticket-less at the Lonesome Dove Trail in Fort Worth? 
Join me for coffee to learn about the western movie sets before my book 
is published and be my guest at the“Remembering Lonesome Dove” panel 
discussion on March 30, 2016. Share intimate moments with the cast and 
crew as they reminisce and tell stories from behind the scenes. With 
special appearances from Robert Duvall, Tommy Lee Jones, Ricky Schroder,
 Danny Glover and Chris Cooper (schedules permitting). Email me for more
 details.
£5 - A personal thank
you postcard from my Southwestern collection of photographs sent from the
Lonesome Dove Reunion & Trail.
£10 - A digital wallpaper image of your choice chosen from my website for personal use on a smartphone or iPhone. A personal thank you
postcard from my Southwestern collection of photographs, sent from the Lonesome
Dove Reunion & Trail.
£20 - A signed 5x7
photograph of your choice chosen from my website. A personal thank you
postcard from my Southwestern collection of photographs, sent from the Lonesome
Dove Reunion & Trail.
£25 - A set of 10
postcards (5 black and white, 5 colour) from my Southwestern collection of
photographs, which includes movie set images made during the book project. A
personal thank you postcard from my Southwestern collection of photographs,
sent from the Lonesome Dove Reunion & Trail.
£50 - A signed 6x8
photograph of your choice chosen from my website. A set of 10
postcards (5 black and white, 5 colour) from my Southwestern collection of
photographs, which includes movie set images made during the book project. A personal thank you
postcard from my Southwestern collection of photographs, sent from the Lonesome
Dove Reunion & Trail.
£50 - A signed 8x10
photograph of your choice chosen from my website. A personal thank you
postcard from my Southwestern collection of photographs, sent from the Lonesome
Dove Reunion & Trail.
£75 - A signed 8x10 photograph of your choice chosen from my website. A set of 10 postcards (5 black and white, 5 colour) from my Southwestern collection of photographs, which includes movie set images made during the book project. A personal thank you postcard from my Southwestern collection of photographs, sent from the Lonesome Dove Reunion Trail.
£100 - A signed 12x16
photograph of your choice chosen from my website. A personal thank you
postcard from my Southwestern collection of photographs, sent from the Lonesome
Dove Reunion & Trail.
£125 - A signed 12x16 photograph of your choice chosen from my website. A set of 10 postcards (5 black and white, 5 colour) from my Southwestern collection of photographs, which includes movie set images made during the book project. A personal thank you postcard from my Southwestern collection of photographs, sent from the Lonesome Dove Reunion Trail.
£500 - Join me next summer for an exclusive, VIP, behind the scenes tour of a New Mexico Western Movie Set. Arrangements to be made nearer the time. The visit needs to be arranged in between filming schedules.
Here are the images that make up my Southwestern postcard collection.



View my website for a choice of signed photographs -www.shirleytipping.comAll collected funds
will go towards attending the Lonesome Dove Reunion & Trail in Fort Worth,
Texas, as well as gathering the research for the Lonesome Dove chapter. Any funds pledged above the target will be used to photograph the remaining 3 movie sets I have still to document.
Other ways you can help. 

If you are not able to
contribute financially, I fully understand. If you like what I'm doing here,
perhaps you can help in other ways?
·  Share this campaign using the Indiegogo
share buttons!
·  Social media and email can be a wonderful
thing, sharing the campaign on your Facebook page or emailing anyone you know
who may be interested would be very much appreciated. 
·  Sharing the Western Movie Sets Facebook
Page will also enlighten people about the book project. Please feel free to
contact me for any more information about the book or leave a comment on the FB
Page.

story:
You Don't Have to Be on Twitter! 

You shouldn't be on any social media platform without a clear reason for why you're doing it and ways to measure results.This book will help you decide which strategies are right for you and your business. Here are some of the specific topics covered: 

  • What sites you need to pay attention to and what you can ignore. 
  • Website mistakes almost every business makes and how to fix them. 
  • Why Your Google+ Local Business Page Might be Turning Customers Away.
  • How to stay 'top of mind' with prospects using content marketing. 
  • Specific strategies for using Facebook and LinkedIn for business. 

This book will be a roadmap for you and your team on how to drive leads, strengthen credibility, stay top of mind, and generate referrals. 

Are you publishing with Wiley again? 

No. We've decided to go with a non-traditional publisher to avoid the 12-18 months process it takes to get the book to market. We have an aggressive timeline to get this book out in three months or less. I need to get it in your hands fast so you can take advantage of the strategies while they are relevant and current. 

So I want you to be part of my team. By making an investment on this page, you'll be part of the creation of this book. You'll get it early and be offered some unique opportunities not offered to the public. 

I hope you'll become part of the Social Media Overload team! 

Sincerely, 

Corey Perlman, Author of Social Media Overload!

story:
WANT TO READ SOME STEAMPUNKY WESTERN PIRATE SMUT?

Well, so do we!

We're Amanda Gannon and Paul Batteiger, a couple of writers, artists, and fans of genre fiction trying to support ourselves by providing the onanistic masses with entertaining and well-written tales of sex and violence.  Our work is plot-heavy, character-driven, and woman-friendly, which is how we say that we try to write stuff that would not piss us off to read.

Our latest project is Queen of the Sky Frontier, our 7th novel. It's a steampunky western erotic adventure serial full of sex, violence, pirates, airships, Experimentals, and maybe even some dinosaurs.   It will run on our site, Adventurotica.com, from February until June, allowing members to read it in bite-sized installments, and after that it will be an ebook and a print edition.  We need to stay afloat while it runs, though, and that is where you come in.

We need to raise $3,000 to cover some of the cost of living over the four-month course of the novel.  Neither of us is employed aside from this, and Amanda is in the unfortunate position of being functionally disabled due to bipolar depression without having yet been approved for disability.  We need food, we need to keep our home, and we need medical care that, frankly, we aren't getting.

This won't cover us completely, but it's a great start, and it's a goal we think we can make if we get help from people like you: people who support independent publishing and who care about enabling creative folks to support themselves doing what they love best.

In exchange, we're offering site memberships, print and ebook copies of the finished novel, and really neat stuff like walk-on roles and sexy bonus scenes tailored to fit your tastes. Your contribution will help us pay the bills and stay in our home and buy medication.  It will literally make us healthier and happier.  Further, we think it will make the genre of erotica a better and more fun place.

If you want to learn more, read on!

 

WHAT IS THIS BOOK ABOUT?

Queen of the Sky Frontier is the sequel to Sky Pirates of the Rio Grande, also a steampunk western.  It stands alone, so don't worry about jumping right in.  Plus, the first book comes with most levels of sponsorship, so you won't be too far behind!  If you're really hot to trot, you can check out the book on Smashwords, here.

What's the story?

Well, you can watch that trailer video up there, which ought to give you some idea (there's a transcript available on the YouTube page for the Deaf/HOH) or you can read this handy-dandy synopsis without having to click on anything!

When Eden Kane defeated Captain Dire, she became ruler of the Brethren of the Sky. With enemies on both sides, she must hold the empire she has won from those who would take it from her. Captain Black's Renegades are massed behind Captain Dire's untested daughter, Azrael Dire. Captain Hood gathers his strength in the wild northlands, ready to seize power with his dreadnought airships. Even Eden's own followers, the pirate fleet of El Dorado, may turn on her at the slightest sign of weakness.  With nothing but courage and her Experimental brain, Eden must fight to be Queen of the Sky Frontier.

What kind of sex is in it?  We're glad you asked.  Queen of the Sky Frontier will be mostly het, but it will contain F/F content, and lots of threesomes.  Boys might kiss before the end, you never know. (Just so you know, we aren't opposed to any orientation or any gender, but Paul is pretty relentlessly straight, and he's writing this one. Amanda remains hopeful, and there's always the chance someone will pick M/M for the bonus scene. Hint, hint.)

We do include some kinky stuff.  That's not the main thrust of the book, but it's an element we tend to come back to over and over. Because, you know, hot.

 

OH MY GOD, WHO ARE YOU PEOPLE?

We're authors published across various genres.  Paul has had pirate fiction (of the non-erotica variety) published in the superb anthology Fast Ships, Black Sails, edited by Ann and Jeff VanderMeer and published by Night Shade Books in 2008.  Amanda's stories have appeared in The Mammoth Book of Best New Erotica twice, in volumes 4 and 6, and both of them contributed stories to Beauty Has Her Way, a fantastic anthology of stories about strong, driven, dangerous women edited by Jennifer Brozek and published by Dark Quest Books in 2011.

Paul will be taking the authorial reins on this project. Amanda will be editing and constructing the artsy perks. She will also be handling some of the sex scenes and bonus scenes, and making sure the overall hotness level is up to par. She's also the kinky stuff fact-checker.

We live in Oklahoma, a poor state with very few resources for poor, mentally ill people with chronic health conditions, and who cannot work outside the home due to these limitations.  We're trying to do the best we can with what we have.  We just don't have much.

When you support us, you're helping us make the money we need to live.  It really is that simple.

 

WHAT WE NEED

Money. (No point in beating around the bush.)

Here is how we will spend it:

  • Materials for the incentives.  The hard copy books will cost around [X amount each] to print and ship.  Supplies and shipping to meet the anticipated demand for bookmarks will run around $150.  Optional licensing for new fonts (we'd really like some) and any necessary stock photos is around $70.
  • Living expenses. Food, bills, and a roof to turn away the life-leeching rays of the blazing hatestar – sorry, the sun. We have this annoying hierarchy of needs thing going on. Damn you, Maslow!
  • Medical care.  We have no insurance, and it isn't cheap to pay for medical care.  We won't burden you with details, but Amanda in particular cannot get some of the medication and treatment she needs through the low-cost clinic and pharmacy she currently attends.

And there you have it. Most of it is going towards keeping us alive and healthy and relatively mentally stable. Is that exciting? No! But we have to stay alive to write smut. Contrary to what you might think, disease-ridden, lunatic zombies don't write very interesting sex scenes. It's just a lot of moaning and cannibalism.

 

WHAT YOU GET

A chance to get lucky!  Our biggest incentive package is the I Want A Pony Package.  One is available for an outright $500 donation, but all donors, every single one, will get a chance at the second.  Give us money, even if all you can afford is a dollar, and we'll put your name into a hat from which we will select the lucky recipient.  You could wind up with something really amazing.  See below for what you'll get.  Read right to the end!

(If you don't want to be entered, you can tell us and we'll exempt you.)

Good karma!  For just $1 you can get the warm and fuzzy feeling of helping independent artists eke out a living pursuing their dream of providing quality adult entertainment to the teeming, hairy-palmed masses!  For $5, we'll even thank you under whatever name you choose!  Fancy!  And, folks, we really don't care if you can't give much.  Anything you can give will help.

Gorgeous handmade bookmarks!  Dress up those eldritch tomes and books of ancient sexual secrets in something classy, like a black velvet ribbon bookmark with sparkly beads and a skull and crossbones charm!  That will definitely distract people from the alarming nature of what you are reading.  The default 11" size will fit trade paperbacks, but if you get in touch with us right after you contribute, we can make yours anywhere from 9" to 15".

You can get the bookmark by itself.  This is a great option for those who wish to show their support, but don't want books full of shagging sent to their house.

Here's one of the bookmarks for The Golden Mask, our last serial campaign – and the one that is currently running at Adventurotica. The bookmarks for Queen of the Sky Frontier will be quite similar.

If you contribute at the $75 level or above, Amanda will pick a ribbon color from what she has available, some beads, some charms, and surprise you with something totally unique.

But wait! There's more! We also offer literary perks!

How about a gruesome literary death?  Want to die bravely fighting sky pirates?  Get shot in a brothel?  How about mauled by a pregnant tiger-woman?  Now that's unique.  Whatever your preferred end, we have you covered.

Or you can have a sexy walk on role!  Bow chicka bow-ow!  We can make this happen.  Seriously.  We have a lot of hot pirate ladies and a lot of sexy scoundrels, and somebody needs to be hitting that, is what I'm saying.

Or both.  You know.  Come before you go?

How about a bonus scene? Frustrated by how your favorite characters never wind up getting it on? We have a perk for that. It doesn't even have to be canon, and we are extremely open-minded about content. We don't judge. Unless that's your thing. Once you've decided who you like best, just tell us what you like and don't like in your sex scenes, and we'll do the rest.

It'll go into the print book, even, but unless you ask us to – oooh, shameless! – we won't tell anyone who is responsible.

Or.

The ultimate perk. The perk of all perks.

Your very own pony!

The I Want A Pony Package.

Amanda will make you an Experimental Pirate Pony out of a real My Little Pony.  Tell her what colors you like, one to three, and the rest will be a mystery until it arrives at your door!

What does that have to do with the book?  Well, you could say it's pirates, but mostly, making ponies is just something that Amanda likes to do. She doesn't take commissions, so this is a rare chance.

You can see her ponies here.

Your pony will come with accessories.  What accessories will depend on what Amanda's bizarre imagination comes up with.  Treasure and a map, at the very least.  Probably a hat, too. Stolen Kisses, here, has some appropriately snazzy accessories, and you can expect something similar.

If you are brave, you can ask that your pony and accessories be made NSFW.  Do you want a full suite of pony-sized BDSM toys?  Do you want your pony to have a cute little strap-on harness? We can build it.  We have the technology. Don't believe us? Have a link.  Click at your own risk; contains pony sex toys. Pink ones. Don't say we didn't warn you.

Your pony will come with a name and a background story so you can get to know your fancy new friend.  It will be very, very beautiful.  It won't be a pony made of diamonds, but it will belong to you.  You will be able to point to it and say to your friends, "Not yours."

Yes, we are asking for a generous donation for the pony.  These little gals can go for up to $200 or more if they're fully accessorized, and you'll be getting every other perk on the list, so we think it's a good deal, and still very, very generous of you.

And one randomly-selected donor will get all of this.  As we said above, everyone who donates will get a chance at winning the second I Want A Pony package.  Sex, violence, pony and all.  Because there's a chance nobody will go for the $500 donation, and Amanda still wants to make a steampunk pirate pony, dammit!

One dollar.

Pony sex toys.

Your odds are pretty good.

 

WHAT HAPPENS

We post the book serially on our site. This will be our 7th novel, and we've never failed to post three serial updates a week. We are reliable. The story will be finished on time. It is projected to run between 50 and 60 chapters, and should be between 125,000 and 150,000 words.

  • Memberships to Adventurotica will be available for use immediately, meaning you can follow along there, three times a week, until the story ends.
  • If you've bought yourself any sort of walk-on role or bonus scene, that will obviously come out with the ebook.
  • The ebook won't come out until after the book has been published in serial form on Adventurotica.com, which should wrap up in June. You'll be able to read it at Adventurotica the entire time.
  • Print books will be released at the same time as the ebook.
  • Bookmarks. Should take us about three weeks to gin those suckers up after the campaign ends, allowing for lag time in getting supplies shipped to us.  They'll be shipped separately when complete.
  • Your pony will take a month or two.  Amanda will stay in touch with you throughout.  If there's no donor, she'll start when the drawing is over and the campaign wraps.  If there is, she'll do the pony for the donor first, and the one for the lucky winner second.

If we don't make goal, we'll still be able to provide the perks for everyone who did donate, and we'll do the best we can on what we get. And someone still gets a pony.

 

THE IMPACT

This is the part where we're supposed to explain how our project is valuable to you and to the world. No pressure. Look, we'd love to claim that our project will bring about world peace by making sure nobody has a hand free to pull a trigger, but that seems unlikely.

  • What we can do is make people happy. Have a good time. Bring something that is unreservedly fun into the world, just because it belongs here.
  • Erotica is an important genre, and we want to make it a better, more entertaining place. Bottom line, people often complain, with good reason, that good erotica is difficult to find. That most of it is poorly-written. That the characters are flat. That the sex is boring. That it doesn't tell an interesting story.  That it's horribly sexist and gross.  Well, all that is changing at lightning speed, and we want to be a part of that.  We've just found that we're happier working for ourselves than for other people, as much as we love those other people.
  • We want to give readers entertainment for adults, not just adult entertainment. There is a dire shortage of well-written, fast-paced, plot-heavy long-form erotica. We want to write a book that provides you, the reader, with a well-told adventure story that doesn't fade to black just when things are getting good.
  • We want to encourage independent erotica publishing by being part of it. By publishing independently, we are freeing ourselves from the restrictions placed on authors by publishers; restrictions on content, on length, on ratio of plot to sex.   We aren't breaking rules. We're stepping outside of them.
  • We want to keep on keepin' on.  This is the important one to us. If you think about how much you enjoy eating, drinking, and being merry, as well as how nice it is if you have a home and access to basic medical care, it should need no explanation. It means the world to us.

 

HOW YOU CAN HELP

Boost the signal! If you can't contribute, that's totally fine.  You can still tell everyone about us.

There are share tools right here on Indiegogo!  Also, we are assuming you have some social network stuff going on, so spreading the word that way would be super-awesome of you.

We're sure you have friends who would appreciate some steampunky swashbuckling pirate-y smut, so, really, you'll be doing them a service sending them our way.

We sincerely appreciate those who support us by helping to spread the word. Y'all do a lot of good, and we cannot thank you enough.
