story:
Short Summary

I'm Jana Marcus, an award-winning documentary photographer, author and genealogist.  I've had two books previously published, and I'm in the processes of completing my third, which promises to be the most exciting story yet! 

I hope you can help me raise the funds needed for the final research trip to New York City to finish my new book "Line of Blood." The book is about a journey.  A journey of discovering my family roots and solving a murder mystery!

26 years ago I found a weathered newspaper article hidden in my grandmother's dresser about a New York Mobster who was mysteriously murdered in 1941.  I would discover that the mobster was my great uncle, and one of the biggest racketeers in Brooklyn and other neighboring territories.  His death was headline news for two weeks in newspapers across the country, and exposed a tremendous amount of police corruption in its wake.  Three years after this uncle's death, my other great uncle mysteriously disappeared trying to find out who killed his brother.  Their cases were never solved, and a 1947 newspaper article considered it one of the top five unsolved murders in New York to date.

I started researching the mysteries of my great uncles many years ago, and the journey has led me down an astounding path of not only discovering my family, but also revealing a lost part of New York history that had been covered-up. I started writing the book about my adventures in solving the crimes five years ago, but could not finish it when my father died, as it was a research adventure the two of us had shared.

Several months ago I decided to dedicate six months to editing the old manuscript, rewriting it and unearthing new clues to the 73-year old murder mystery I have spent half my life trying to solve. Now, as completion of the book is in sight, I need to take one more research trip to New York to literally unearth the final pieces of evidence in this long journey to finding the truth.

By contributing to this research trip you will be helping me to complete the final chapter, which is happening in real time, and solve the murder mystery that has haunted our family and remained a New York cold case for decades.  Your financial help will allow myself, a videographer and my team on the ground in NY, which now includes a cold-case detective and a psychic medium, to retrace the steps of my great uncle's final night, and unearth missing documentation.  We will be filming the entire adventure, and hope, with your help, to go back this summer.

What We Need & What You Get

I'm hoping to raise $4000, so the videographer and I can afford travel and lodging to New York, and to rent the equipment we need to film the experience and to dig through the ancient basement of the original headquarters of my great uncle's business in Brooklyn, where we know paper work and other important information is buried.  Part of the money will be also be used to pay fees for research and to pay for the services of the cold-case psychic.  Some of you may not believe in the metaphysical, but this truly gifted psychic has already given me many clues and names that we have been able to substantiate with real evidence. And, of course, to pay indiegogo.

There are perks to donating!

Any amount of donation is welcome, large or small.  Check out the perks of donating from receiving an advance copy of the book, to an exclusive DVD of the adventure in New York with the psychic medium and researchers.  Follow along with the action that will be the final chapter of the book!

Other perks include complimentary research into YOUR family tree, and special thanks on my website and in the book acknowledgments.

The Impact

Your contribution will make a huge difference in completing this book, which is of historical value, as it sheds light on a piece of New York crime history that has never been told before.  The work is also a helpful example of how to utilize records and research when investigating your family heritage. 

Most importantly, your contribution will bring us one step closer to revealing the real story behind the headlines and solving the case!

In 2011, I raised over $20,000 on Kickstarter, and through private donations, to publish my photodocumentary "Transfigurations." That was a huge success and the book was published in a beautiful coffee table edition that went on to win "Best LGBT non-fiction book of 2012" by the Independent Publisher's Association Awards of New York.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren't able to contribute, there are other ways you can help:

  • Help me get the word out and make some noise about my campaign!
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools and tell your friends!

story:
Cruise into Happiness & Our Next Book!

Thanks for stopping by! We're two women who are authors, professional speakers, have husbands and dogs, adore each other and are on a quest to spread happiness to the world, one set of ears – or in this case, eyes! – at a time. Here's who we are:

June Cline, CSP is a Southern, sassy, savvy, Harley-riding humorist who's worked with companies like PetSmart, Toyota and the National Dental Association, helping them understand the ROI of LOL. As a keynote speaker, she shows companies how to turn wit into wealth with colleagues, customers and clients.

Sandy Weaver Carman is creative, compassionate and crazy - in a fun sort of way! She's an award-winning author, speaker and radio personality who works with writers, speakers, trainers and coaches, taking their existing work and turning it into audio products.

We teamed up in 2013 to produce an online radio show, Happiness Recipe, and it's a world-wide hit. Each week, we interview thought leaders, asking them to share their wit, wisdom and wonderful food. Internationally recognized speakers and authors spend half an hour talking about what makes them happy, how they spread happiness in the world and one specific food that makes their taste-buds happy. 

We're putting together a book of the best of our first year of shows. "Happiness Recipe - Whippin' up Happiness with Wit, Wisdom and Wonderful Food!" will be out just in time for those New Year's resolutions to be happier that people make! Twenty of our guests are serving up their own Happiness Recipes in this book, and you can be part of the fun! Though not a cookbook, you will have access to some fabulous recipes when the book is published.

What We Need & What You Get

What do you get? Anything from honorable mention to a Caribbean cruise!

A digital preview copy

Your name on the book's website

An autographed copy of the book

Being a guest on the Happiness Recipe radio show

Entrepreneur/Business Happiness Package

Join us on a Caribbean Happiness Summit experience

We're so excited about our first Happiness Summit - September of 2015, cruising the western Caribbean. Maybe you've been there before, but this is all about the Happiness Experience! We'll have surprise guests, celebrities and fun folks sharing their happiness recipes with you. Your room will have a balcony - who wants to sail without being able to see the sea? 

We're looking for funding to produce the Happiness Recipe book in paperback, eBook and audio book formats so people can get happier any way they choose! We're working with publishing professionals, editors, graphic designers and layout artists, none of whom work for free, dang it! 

We're working to create a complete Happiness Recipe experience - whipping up happiness worldwide through our weekly radio show, this book project, the cruise and other fun happiness plans we have for you in 2015!

We expect to reach our funding goal, with the money going to production of the physical, audio and e-books.


**Rookie Mistake Alert!** At the $55 level, you get TWO autographed copies of the book, not just one. Because people have already claimed that perk we can't change the text to reflect that you get twice the books for the same price!

        

Help Build a Happier World!

Do you want to lighten up?

Do you know someone who needs to be happier?

Do you think the world's going to hell in a handbasket?

All of these are reasons we decided to find a way to spread happiness.

Happiness is one of the most-Googled words in the world, so we know that people are looking for it, and we want to be the place they find it. The value of our project is to help people find and identify their happiness by hearing the experiences of others. 

Wait until you hear some of the awesome stories and experiences shared by our guest authors/thought leaders/experts. In their daily lives, these influencers get paid to share their wisdom and expertise. We've gathered twenty of them and are giving you their best stuff in this book. Oh, and it's all gluten-free, non-GMO and organic!

When you support this campaign, you'll be part of building a happier world. Is that part of your Happiness Recipe? Well c'mon, then, no more stewing - let's mix it up!

Half-baked & Well-done

Our goal is to have the book out in time for the 2015 New Year's Resolution season. We want to make the book a reality, and know that once it is, it'll help make the world a happier place.

We're working with top pros to make the book as beautiful, helpful and happy-making as possible. In addition, we have lots of people listening all over the world, so there's a built-in audience for the book and the message. 

With hundreds of thousands of followers and listeners around the world, we know we're already making an impact. When you help us get the book published, you'll help make that impact even bigger!

Other Ways You Can Help

For those of you who would like to contribute but are unable to financially, that's OK. Here's how you can help - and yes, it really will help. Get the word out, stir up your friends, and help this campaign funding rise like a biscuit. Let your Facebook friends know and share the link. Tweet it out. Instagram it. Pin it on Pinterest. Share it wherever you like to hang out. And that's all there is to it. 

Oh, and we'd love to have you join our community, listen to and share our radio show, and let us know what makes you happy. Thank you for helping us to make the world a happier, better place to live! 

Sincerely,

June and Sandy

Happiness Recipe International

story:
Arcenciel Publishing

Once upon a time, I saw my high school classmates reading. The teenaged girls read Sweet Dreams romances.  Our more adventurous classmates read Silhouette Romances, the red ones. The boys read adventures. And comics. And I wondered why there was nothing like that for me.  So I read the requisite YA novels, and later, the Harry Potters and Dan Browns and wondered why there weren't any good characters who were people like me.

At a salon, I saw the female attendants reading Precious Hearts Romances and wondered what the pretty trans lady with the flaming hair read when she had no customers. (It was Yes Magazine, a showbiz Filipino gossip mag.) 

That was the beginning of Arcenciel. It means rainbow. To us, it's not just a symbol of diversity, it is also a sign that after the rain, things get better. More beautiful. Hopeful. This is what Arcenciel Publishing hopes to accomplish. For the confused child who thinks he is alone. For the adolescent who wonders why no one understands. Because if people did, there would be books like that, yes?

Our Mission

We write books for People Like Us. The disenfranchised and deprived. The ones who can't find people like them till much later and after spending too many years thinking we're the only ones.  We write and publish for us, whose dreams are often limited because of a society that dictates the distance we can reach. As the world around us changes, there are still places where progress moves at a glacial pace, some even taking ten steps back from where they’re supposed to go.

The first book is called Teka, Wait... Di Ako Prepared. I wrote this first book for my Filipino LGBT community, because we, LGBT and people of color, as well as those who stand with us, wondering what chance we have in a world that's been made harder for us,  need to keep dreaming for our happy ending. 

The next books will be for and from the other people of the rainbow– not necessarily LGBT, but the diverse groups: the family with children on the spectrum, the ethnic child trying to maintain his or her identity in a colonial society, the one who is a hundred pounds overweight or underweight, the ones they call different, the ones they call handicapped. Teka, wait!  First things first.  Ito muna.

About Teka, Wait...Di Ako Prepared

Teka, Wait...Di Ako Prepared is a Filipino book about growing up gay. It's not heavy literature. It's not some deep, dark peek into the underbelly of whatever it is people seem to want to focus on when it comes to Filipino LGBT lit. It's a book about growing up gay. And a little peek into what lies ahead. And about happy endings– at the end of the harder road we've all been dealt. We think it's what our community needs.


Where We Are Now

Three weeks away. Literally. We feel like we’ve done a pretty decent job writing a Filipino book for the LGBT reader that isn't too much fluff nor too deep and heavy. Something readable. Something to get them to read more.  It's been written, rewritten, beta'd, edited and reedited and ready for the online reader. But.

The people whom we want to read this book most– no, the people we think NEED to read this book – will need a printed copy.



What We Need

We’re done with the book but we want to see it in print. Good old paper and cardstock cover print. Because the people we want to reach are the ones who, as kids, never got around to love reading because they never got past the "why is there nothing for me to read" point like I did. People who never got past never seeing a book have a character they could identify with, and so never loved reading as much as we do.   They probably read, what, a book a year? In this day and age, trying to read on a phone or a tablet, or on the computer will be too distracting. We think this book needs to be on paper. We need your help getting this book out.


Where You Come In

We could really use some help. It will cost  around $15,000 just to get an initial run on print. We'd like to print more, and get it to the hands of the people who need to read it. After that, we'll need to get it out to the hands of people who need to read it the most. Elbow grease, leg work, kapal ng mukha. And of course, money.

After we're done with this run, we're going to translate it into English. And if that goes well, perhaps other languages. Because we know there are more people who need to know there are people like them. So please, help in what way you can.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone can donate. That doesn't mean you can't help–
you can put in a good word for us and our project with your friends. Help us get the word out to people who can make this happen. Share our link on your wall. Tweet it to your friends. And if you're at The Manila Pride March in December, come see us and a grab a bookmark anyway.

story:
"Juanma" (Juan Manuel Rueda Cotes) es nuestro hijo de 7 años que hace dos años sufrió un absurdo accidente. Su caso pueden conocerlo en el portal http://casojuanma.com/wp/ (english version)

La tragedia de nuestro hijo inicia el 8 de septiembre de 2012 cuando Juanma se electrocuta al ingresar a una piscina de niños en el conjunto Mirador de la Bahía en la ciudad de Santa Marta  celebrando un cumpleaños infantil, como lo resgistraron los noticieros en su momento (http://www.noticiascaracol.com/nacion/video-274563-nino-recibio-descarga-electrica-al-meterse-piscina-santa-marta).

 La descarga que recibió nuestro hijo ocasionó su ahogamiento, del cual mi esposa y yo logramos rescatarle,  gracias a que ambos estábamos como siempre a su lado mientras jugaba  en esta fiesta de cumpleaños. Sin embargo, a pesar de nuestra rápida reacción (en la que ambos sufrimos procesos de electrocución), rescatamos a nuestro hijo en un paro cardiorespitarorio, que solo pudo superar gracias a maniobras de resucitación que aplicó el equipo de urgencias de la clínica SALUDCOP de  Santa Marta, ubicada a pocas cuadras del lugar del absurdo accidente.

 A pesar de estos múltiples eventos fatales nuestro hijo Juanma, como el sorprendente hombre araña que tanto admira, sobrevive y se mantiene luchando desde ese día en contra de todos pronósticos, gracias a la combinación de dos fuerzas poderosas, el poder sanador de Dios y el amor de sus padres y de todos cuanto conocen a Juanma, pues eso es lo que Juanma siempre ha emanado AMOR.

Actualmente y con mucho esfuerzo hemos iniciado un tratamiento de rehabilitación Neurológica en Guayaquil Ecuador, cuyos resultados iniciales son alentadores y al que debemos asistir nuevamente en Noviembre de 2014. Sin embargo los costos de esta nueva sesión de terapias superan nuestros ingresos familiares, razón por la cual hemos creado esta campaña a través de esta mundialmente conocida plataforma de apoyo económico  para continuar por la "ruta de vida y rehabilitación de Juanma", la cual no dudamos logrará gracias a este tratamiento y al amor que abunda en él y a su alrededor y claro gracias a Dios... que es amor.
Agradecemos no solo su apoyo económico, sino su amor y oraciones y su capacidad de difundir y convencer a sus amigos de darnos el apoyo que nuestro hijo necesita.

story:
"Beneath The Surface" book launch

My book is to be released in Mumbai, Maharashtra India via Leadstart Publishing.  

http://www.leadstartcorp.com/

I am a naturopathic doctor who is now focusing on her creative side, which is mainly writing and acting. My book combines my passion in mind body medicine and the written form of expression.

I want my book to touch hearts and create impact through inner change. I believe that healing starts from the self. If we allow ourselves to heal, we can help our planet to heal. With the state that the world is in, it is very important for me to get my message out there.

Based on Chinese Medicine philosophy my book is written in poetic prose style as a stream of consciousness. The five elements, which forms the basis of all ancient forms of medicine is a central theme in my book. Blood imagery highlights the link between the non physical and physical realms. Mind and matter compete as emotions flow through the central character.  I play with these polarities as the other characters come in and out of her life like wisps of her imagination.

Where your donation will go

The money that I raise through this campaign will go towards the cost of the flight. 1600 dollars for a roundtrip flight  to Mumbai and back. 200 dollars will go towards the cost of the venue which is Title Waves Bookstore  24th Road TPS 111 Mumbai, Maharashtra India 400050. 

If I don't reach my goal, I will use whatever money I raise to promote my book across Canada although I would prefer to be in my homeland to sign books and discuss my words.

The Impact

This is my first book and my main goal would be to get people thinking. You are welcome to check out my website http://sherryduggal.wix.com/sherry-duggal. 
You can also follow my blog             http://sherryduggal.wordpress.com/
and like my facebook page              https://www.facebook.com/sduggalcreative
I am very honored to have celebrity singers Anup Jalota and Talat Aziz attending my launch.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Please spread the word and share my campaign on social media!

    I want to thank you in advance.

    I also appreciate World Poetry Canada and Writers International Network for helping me promote my campaign. Love and gratitude!

story:
From Books To Riches

My name is Mike White, the Owner and CEO of From Books To Riches. I have a Bachelor's in Business and have 10 years experience in Management and 3 years in Sales.
From Books To Riches is meant to help enlighten people to live their lives to the fullest. Through readings people are able to find themselves and their purpose along with insight on how to excel in any form of business. Whether it is entrepreneurship, management, or sales, reading is the best way to find out what you are passionate about and how to achieve success in any environment.
By contributing to From Books To Riches you will be helping enlighten society. You will be encouraging people to educate themselves and stop living in fear. The main genres will be in self improvement, business, philosophy, and entrepreneurship books which will in turn change the perception people have on their lives.

Funding

From Books To Riches is looking for $15,000 in funding. This will give me the opportunity to market my service, purchase advertising space on multiple platforms, purchase inventory, purchase raw materials needed to get From Books To Riches off the ground, and to also have my website completed.
For helping fund my venture, I will be setting up several different perks. You will have several options to choose from which will consist of one or more complimentary monthly packages, or a chance to donate books to those who may need it more.
If the entire goal of $15,000 is not reached I will still use the funding that I had raised to contribute to the business in the same areas specified above. You will still be an asset and will still be able to help those who need self improvement or those who want to start a business but do not know where to begin.

Impact

This project is not only valuable to me, but it is also valuable to you. You will be encouraging the up and coming entrepreneurs, you will be saving someone from living their life in fear and not knowing who they are, and most importantly you will be educating society as a whole.
People get to caught up in the things they may not necessarily need to concern themselves with. I am helping them let go and start fresh, knowing that everyday is a new experience and they can change their perception at any point in time. This service will be extremely beneficial to all ages, male or female, from any origin. Therefore my demographic is huge.

Possible Obstacles

From Books To Riches is currently the only service doing what we are doing. We are not the typical book club, although we will have a discussion board on the site. There is no other monthly book club at the same price or in the same spectrum as From Books To Riches. This means that possible obstacles and risks are extremely minimal due to lack of competition.

Help

The more you help with this funding project the more you will make this come true. People need a service like this with hand picked selections on how to improve life. There is so much for people to learn especially when it can help them achieve health, wealth, love, happiness, and success.
So please spread the word through indiegogo share tools or any online social media you may have. Thank you for your time, this means more to me than you know!

story:
Bref résumé


Lutte 2.0 est la nouvelle-vague de la lutte québécoise. Nous mélangeons l'esthétique du cinéma et l'action intense de la lutte professionnelle. Vous avez envie de voir sur vos écrans une telle émission produite par des cinéastes et des tripeux de lutte ? N'attendez pas un instant de plus et contribuez à ce projet de pur divertissement extrême !!!

Je m'appelle Nicolas Proulx, je suis dans le monde du cinéma depuis plus de 15 ans en tant que producteur, réalisateur, scénariste et caméraman. Le septième art n’est pas ma seule passion ; je suis aussi un mordu de la lutte depuis l'âge de 5 ans. Cette passion m'a amené à une carrière parallèle de lutteur indépendant entre 1998 et 2009. Malheureusement, à la suite d’une fracture du fémur en 2009, je n’ai pu poursuivre cette activité.

Je souhaite m'impliquer à nouveau dans ce domaine, et combiner mes deux passions pour le cinéma et pour la lutte. Avec mon équipe, je propose de filmer quelques événements de la fédération « PWA » pour ensuite transformer le produit en émission mensuelle pour le Web. Cette émission se démarquera par une vision plus cinématographique de l'événement. Nous y ajouterons des segments en coulisse impliquant des changements narratifs intenses et imprévisibles. Pour accompagner l’action d’une manière dynamique, il y aura plusieurs angles de caméra dans le feu de l'action, un montage innovateur et des commentateurs excentriques.

Mentionnons que la programmation prévue cet été pour les événements de la PWA mettra en vedette des superstars internationales telles que Mason Ryan (WWE), Abyss (ancien champion du monde TNA), Sylvain Grenier (ancien champion par équipe WWE), Rob Terry (ancien TV champion à TNA) ainsi que des lutteurs bien connus au Québec comme Marko Estrada, Darko, Dru Onyx entre autres. 

À quoi servira la subvention demandée ?

  • Le projet financera 6 émissions Web. Ces émissions seront présentées mensuellement à partir de l'automne 2015 sur YouTube, Facebook et sur un site web attitré au projet. Bien sûr, nous tâcherons de donner de l’ampleur au projet pour attirer l’attention des médias et de la télévision. Votre soutien est le coup de main dont nous avons besoin pour commencer cette belle aventure.

  • Le montant servira à rémunérer les employés attitrés au projet : un monteur image et sonore, un recherchiste, deux commentateurs, deux caméramans, un producteur et un concepteur web. Nous avons déjà filmé une partie du projet bénévolement, car nous croyons au potentiel de l'émission. Nous sommes certains qu'avec votre aide, nous parviendrons à un résultat professionnel comparable à des productions indépendantes comme « ROH », « TOW » et « House of Hardcore ».
  • Si le montant visé n'est pas atteint, nous essaierons de compléter le financement par des commandites et des subventions. 

       L'impact

  • Depuis 1991, la télévision québécoise (à l'exception de RDS) ne présente plus d’émissions de lutte. Pourtant, lors de la diffusion des matchs de la WWF par TVA, les côtes d'écoutes étaient excellentes. Au Québec, plusieurs organisations de lutte québécoise profitent d'une popularité notable. Pourtant, aucune plateforme télévisuelle ne s'intéresse à eux.
  • Depuis 1998, j'ai produit une vingtaine de courts-métrages, plusieurs vidéoclips, une série Web, une web-télé (Vision Donnacona), un long-métrage documentaire (en cours de montage) et j'ai travaillé sur de nombreux tournages cinématographiques professionnels. 
  • En ce qui concerne la lutte, j'ai eu une carrière indépendante entre 1998 et 2009. J'ai lutté pour des fédérations telles que « CCW », « RCW » et « R2W ». J'ai aussi joué les rôles d'arbitre et de manager  en plus de faire un reportage à Boston (RDS.CA) sur l'école de lutte du légendaire Killer Kowalsky. Enfin, j'ai aussi à mon actif un documentaire/best-off appelé « West Side Connection ». 

Risques et défis

  • La lutte indépendante sur le Web possède une popularité importante et le fait de bénéficier de la participation de stars connues, amènera leurs partisans à s'intéresser à notre produit. Par exemple, en profitant du partage sur la page Facebook de superstars comme « Abyss » qui possèdent plus de 5000 inscrits, nous élargissons considérablement l’auditoire pour nos émissions. 

  • Ça fait au-dessus de quinze ans que je produis et réalise des tournages. J'ai l'habitude de gérer des budgets. Je n'ai jamais excédé le budget accordé, et ce, en menant à terme les projets en respectant les prévisions.
  • Advenant que les émissions n'obtiennent pas la popularité espérée, notre stratégie de promotion s’articulera en trois niveaux. Tout d’abord, la promotion des émissions se fera à travers la présentation de l’univers de « Lutte 2.0 » via la presse écrite et audiovisuelle. La première émission sera distribuée aux journaux, radios et télévisions de la région de Québec dès sa sortie. Nous tenterons d'intéresser les chaînes de télévision importante comme Radio-Canada, TVA, Télé-Québec et Canal V pour qu'elles présentent un reportage en pleine heure d’écoute, consacré au projet. De même, les chaines de radio comme 93.3 FM, CHOI FM, ROUGE FM et les journaux du Québec seront sollicités. Dans le passé, nous avons procédé de cette manière pour faire connaître une de nos séries appelée « Studio Ste-Cravache ». Par la suite, Radio-Canada, CHYZ-FM, CHOI-FM, Info-Portneuf, Le Courrier de Portneuf ont tous fait des reportages sur le concept. Cela a suscité plus de mille visites en quelques jours sur YouTube, en plus d'une soirée de première réussie dans le bar pour artiste « Le Cercle ». Le nom et le concept de l’émission s’en sont trouvés efficacement propagés.
  • Le deuxième niveau promotionnel passera par la tenue d'événements de promotions (ex. soirées de premières et activités promotionnelles) pendant lesquels l’émission sera présentée devant une audience. Le troisième niveau promotionnel se situe sur le web. Nous ouvrirons un site internet  que nous mettrons à jour régulièrement. Le site sera pourvu de différentes fonctions d’interactivités permettant une propagation virale du site et de ses informations sur une multitude de réseaux et sous différentes formes. Sur ce site, nous présenterons des vidéos à propos de notre produit. De plus, nous tiendrons informé notre auditoire des dernières nouvelles et promotions, tout en exposant constamment de nouvelles photos des lutteurs. Nous entendons tirer profit de la forte tendance actuelle des réseaux sociaux. Aussi une page Facebook sera créée pour l’émission afin de regrouper nos auditeurs, de les tenir informés et d’interagir le plus possible avec eux. Dans la même optique, un compte Twitter sera éventuellement opérationnel. Par le biais des réseaux sociaux, nous souhaitons impliquer notre audience dans l'amélioration du produit. Nous espérons que le bouche à oreille et la mise en place de cette stratégie de promotion nous permettront de propager le concept de notre série et de nous constituer un auditoire de base, que nous escomptons agrandir continuellement par une promotion assidue via les trois niveaux compris dans notre stratégie.
story_txt:
Bref résumé
Lutte 2.0 est la nouvelle-vague de la lutte québécoise. Nous mélangeons l'esthétique du cinéma et l'action intense de la lutte professionnelle. Vous avez envie de voir sur vos écrans une telle émission produite par des cinéastes et des tripeux de lutte ? N'attendez pas un instant de plus et contribuez à ce projet de pur divertissement extrême !!!Je m'appelle Nicolas Proulx, je suis dans le monde du cinéma depuis plus de 15 ans en tant que producteur, réalisateur, scénariste et caméraman. Le septième art n’est pas ma seule passion ; je suis aussi un mordu de la lutte depuis l'âge de 5 ans. Cette passion m'a amené à une carrière parallèle de lutteur indépendant entre 1998 et 2009. Malheureusement, à la suite d’une fracture du fémur en 2009, je n’ai pu poursuivre cette activité.
Je souhaite m'impliquer à nouveau dans ce domaine, et combiner mes deux passions pour le cinéma et pour la lutte. Avec mon équipe, je propose de filmer quelques événements de la fédération « PWA » pour ensuite transformer le produit en émission mensuelle pour le Web. Cette émission se démarquera par une vision plus cinématographique de l'événement. Nous y ajouterons des segments en coulisse impliquant des changements narratifs intenses et imprévisibles. Pour accompagner l’action d’une manière dynamique, il y aura plusieurs angles de caméra dans le feu de l'action, un montage innovateur et des commentateurs excentriques.
Mentionnons que la programmation prévue cet été pour les événements de la PWA mettra en vedette des superstars internationales telles que Mason Ryan (WWE), Abyss (ancien champion du monde TNA), Sylvain Grenier (ancien champion par équipe WWE), Rob Terry (ancien TV champion à TNA) ainsi que des lutteurs bien connus au Québec comme Marko Estrada, Darko, Dru Onyx entre autres. 
À quoi servira la subvention demandée ?

Le projet financera 6 émissions Web. Ces émissions seront présentées mensuellement à partir de l'automne 2015 sur YouTube, Facebook et sur un site web attitré au projet. Bien sûr, nous tâcherons de donner de l’ampleur au projet pour attirer l’attention des médias et de la télévision. Votre soutien est le coup de main dont nous avons besoin pour commencer cette belle aventure.



Le montant servira à rémunérer les employés attitrés au projet : un monteur image et sonore, un recherchiste, deux commentateurs, deux caméramans, un producteur et un concepteur web. Nous avons déjà filmé une partie du projet bénévolement, car nous croyons au potentiel de l'émission. Nous sommes certains qu'avec votre aide, nous parviendrons à un résultat professionnel comparable à des productions indépendantes comme « ROH », « TOW » et « House of Hardcore ».
Si le montant visé n'est pas atteint, nous essaierons de compléter le financement par des commandites et des subventions. 

       L'impact

Depuis 1991, la télévision québécoise (à l'exception de RDS) ne présente plus d’émissions de lutte. Pourtant, lors de la diffusion des matchs de la WWF par TVA, les côtes d'écoutes étaient excellentes. Au Québec, plusieurs organisations de lutte québécoise profitent d'une popularité notable. Pourtant, aucune plateforme télévisuelle ne s'intéresse à eux.
Depuis 1998, j'ai produit une vingtaine de courts-métrages, plusieurs vidéoclips, une série Web, une web-télé (Vision Donnacona), un long-métrage documentaire (en cours de montage) et j'ai travaillé sur de nombreux tournages cinématographiques professionnels. 
En ce qui concerne la lutte, j'ai eu une carrière indépendante entre 1998 et 2009. J'ai lutté pour des fédérations telles que « CCW », « RCW » et « R2W ». J'ai aussi joué les rôles d'arbitre et de manager  en plus de faire un reportage à Boston (RDS.CA) sur l'école de lutte du légendaire Killer Kowalsky. Enfin, j'ai aussi à mon actif un documentaire/best-off appelé « West Side Connection ». 


Risques et défis

La lutte indépendante sur le Web possède une popularité importante et le fait de bénéficier de la participation de stars connues, amènera leurs partisans à s'intéresser à notre produit. Par exemple, en profitant du partage sur la page Facebook de superstars comme « Abyss » qui possèdent plus de 5000 inscrits, nous élargissons considérablement l’auditoire pour nos émissions. 



Ça fait au-dessus de quinze ans que je produis et réalise des tournages. J'ai l'habitude de gérer des budgets. Je n'ai jamais excédé le budget accordé, et ce, en menant à terme les projets en respectant les prévisions.
Advenant que les émissions n'obtiennent pas la popularité espérée, notre stratégie de promotion s’articulera en trois niveaux. Tout d’abord, la promotion des émissions se fera à travers la présentation de l’univers de « Lutte 2.0 » via la presse écrite et audiovisuelle. La première émission sera distribuée aux journaux, radios et télévisions de la région de Québec dès sa sortie. Nous tenterons d'intéresser les chaînes de télévision importante comme Radio-Canada, TVA, Télé-Québec et Canal V pour qu'elles présentent un reportage en pleine heure d’écoute, consacré au projet. De même, les chaines de radio comme 93.3 FM, CHOI FM, ROUGE FM et les journaux du Québec seront sollicités. Dans le passé, nous avons procédé de cette manière pour faire connaître une de nos séries appelée « Studio Ste-Cravache ». Par la suite, Radio-Canada, CHYZ-FM, CHOI-FM, Info-Portneuf, Le Courrier de Portneuf ont tous fait des reportages sur le concept. Cela a suscité plus de mille visites en quelques jours sur YouTube, en plus d'une soirée de première réussie dans le bar pour artiste « Le Cercle ». Le nom et le concept de l’émission s’en sont trouvés efficacement propagés.
Le deuxième niveau promotionnel passera par la tenue d'événements de promotions (ex. soirées de premières et activités promotionnelles) pendant lesquels l’émission sera présentée devant une audience. Le troisième niveau promotionnel se situe sur le web. Nous ouvrirons un site internet  que nous mettrons à jour régulièrement. Le site sera pourvu de différentes fonctions d’interactivités permettant une propagation virale du site et de ses informations sur une multitude de réseaux et sous différentes formes. Sur ce site, nous présenterons des vidéos à propos de notre produit. De plus, nous tiendrons informé notre auditoire des dernières nouvelles et promotions, tout en exposant constamment de nouvelles photos des lutteurs. Nous entendons tirer profit de la forte tendance actuelle des réseaux sociaux. Aussi une page Facebook sera créée pour l’émission afin de regrouper nos auditeurs, de les tenir informés et d’interagir le plus possible avec eux. Dans la même optique, un compte Twitter sera éventuellement opérationnel. Par le biais des réseaux sociaux, nous souhaitons impliquer notre audience dans l'amélioration du produit. Nous espérons que le bouche à oreille et la mise en place de cette stratégie de promotion nous permettront de propager le concept de notre série et de nous constituer un auditoire de base, que nous escomptons agrandir continuellement par une promotion assidue via les trois niveaux compris dans notre stratégie.

story:
Short Summary

Since 2013, I've been compiling stories and lessons learned from my husband, Clark Baker.  I also reached out to employees and friends of Clark's who shared stories adding to the richness of the manuscript.  I feel this book will help any aspiring leader.  Proceeds of WORK, PLAY, PRAY HARD will be given to two YMCA camps:   Camp Widjiwagan in Nashville and Camp Cullen in Houston.                                                                                                                                                                            Please help me with get the word out about this inspiring book.                                                              Jerold Panas, Philanthrophy Media's 2016 America's Top Fundraising Professional states,  "If you know Clark Baker, you will want to have this book.  If you don't know him, you will find a lesson on every page.  You need to have this book."                                                                                          If you would be interested in having Clark speak to your group or host a book signing please contact me at carolynbaker@sbcglobal.net.

story:
Soru: Mart sonu yapilacak belediye baskanligi secimlerindeki amaciniz nedir?

Cevap: 1000 oyu AKP’den CHP’ye gecirmek. Ankara’da 2009 secimlerinde AKP’nin %50 ve ustu, CHP’nin de %10 gibi dusuk oy aldigi mahalleleri hedef alacagim. 

Soru: Bu nasil yapilacak?

Cevap: CHP Yenimahalle adayi ile konusuldu (Cayyolu ve cevresi Cankaya'ya baglandigi icin, CHPnin Yenimahalle'de kazanmasi kesin degil). Yenimahalle'de AKPnin cok oy aldigi bir mahallede forma dagitilacak. Aday dagitacak, biz degil. Bu nereden cikti derseniz, hep okuyoruz bulgur, mercimek ve komurle AKP oy topluyor diye. Bu da onun ayarinda populer bir hareket. Forma cocuk bedeninde olacak. Amac cocuk mahallede mac yaparken CHP reklami yapmasi. (bu secime kadar havalar soguk olsa da, 2015te de secim var) 

Soru: Bizden beklentiniz ne?

Cevap: Kampanyaya hem fikir olarak hem de maddi olarak destek olmaniz. Maddi olarak, birakin son 10 seneyi, Gezi olaylarindan sonra RTE ve AKP’yi her “sevgi” ile andiginiz zaman icin $1 bagislasaniz (Facebook, Twitter dahil), Turkiye’deki tekstil sektorune altin cagini yasatiriz. 

Soru: Toplanan parayla nasil forma bastirilacak?

Cevap: Ankara'da bir yerle konusuldu, fiyat alindi. Forma Subat ortasi gibi ismarlanacak. Forma sentetik kumas karisimli, iyi kalite olacak ki, formayi alan atmaya kiyamasin. Forma kirmizi, beyaz olacak. Uzerinde CHP logosu ve "Her Sey Ankara Icin" yazacak. 

Soru: Formalari dagittik, ne kadar ise yarar?

Cevap: Kampanyanin etkisini olcmeyi dusunuyorum. 2009’da hedef mahalledeki oy dagilimi belli. Bu 2014 secim sonuclari ile karsilastirilip (genel oy degisimi de dikkate alinarak), her formayla kac oy elde edildigi hesaplanabilir. Onerdigim farkli olceklerde yapilabilecegi icin toplanan paraya gore belki birkac mahallede formayi dagitirz. Diyelim herhangi bir etkisi olmadi. O zaman da kisitli imkanla yasayan bir cocuga forma vermis oluruz. Bu da cok kotu sayilmaz. Ama ben etkili olacagini dusunuyorum. Hersey yolunda giderse benzer kampanya genel secimde de yapilir.

NOT:

Amerika/Avrupa ve Turkiye’den en yuksek bagis yapan 10'ar kisiye (toplam 20 kisiye) forma hediye edilecektir.

(esitlik halinde erken bagis yapana)

story:
Story of My Book

Saving the Front follows the trials and tribulations of Army nurses serving on the frontlines during WWII.

My name is M.E. Gustafson, and I am the author of Saving the Front. I wrote this book to honor the service of Army nurses who risked their lives to provide medical care on the frontlines.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover more about what life was like for WWII nurses on the frontlines. I hope this book excites the same passion and excitement in you that I have for historical fiction. Ultimately, I want you to learn more about the experience of nursing units during WWII.

In this book, you'll learn about the foreign nursing service and medical care at the front. You'll hear stories such as...

  • The terrifying task of disembarking from a military transport ship. Timed in between the giant swells, military personnel carried all their luggage and equipment down a solitary ladder to the barges that will carry them to land
  • Rendering medical care by lamplight. With limited medical supplies and medicine, every resource available was used
  • What life was like living under the path of mortar shells, the threat of sniper fire, and air raids

You will love this book if you enjoy historical fiction, WWII history, and spunky characters.

Saving the Front is a fiction book that speaks to history fans and those who want to look at World War II and women’s military service in a new way.

25% of net proceeds from all book sales will be donated to charities supporting military personnel and their families

The Book: Saving the Front

The book is written in 2 parts.

Part 1 contains the introduction + chapters 1-5. From training drills to submarine attacks, you will follow their journey from the United States to Europe as they prepare to serve on the frontlines

Part 2 contains chapters 6-20. Military barracks give way to canvas cots in wind-blown tents. Life on the frontlines is marred by mortar shells, insufficient medical supplies, and dwindling resources.

What I Need & What You Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April 2021
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats)
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Spring

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process
  • And much more!
  • Please note: The cost of shipping in the United States is included in the cost of your purchases. Note that international shipping is an additional cost that will be added at check-out

About The Author

M.E. Gustafson is a corporate strategy junkie with a love for e-commerce and consumer packaged goods. Insatiably curious, she could do a month-long monologue of completely random facts. Did you know... the earliest documented use of OMG (Oh My God) as an initialism was in a 1917 letter to Winston Churchill from an Admiral in the British Navy?

The book is inspired by both her grandmothers’ foreign service with the Army Nursing Corps. Growing up, she knew very little about her grandmothers’ experiences as WWII nurses. It was only after they both passed away that she started to learn more about their lives during the war. The book started out of complete curiosity, an attempt to fill in the blanks.

An avid world traveler, M.E. loves to capture life from unexpected angles. Be it the intricate architecture that adorns Big Ben in London or the wear pattern on ancient cobblestones in Rome. When not amusing herself with intellectual musings or wandering around the city like Odysseus, she is always looking for new antiquarian books. You’ll find her constantly being sucked into the vortex of a literary treasure hunt.

For more information, you can connect with M.E. Gustafson at author.megustafson@gmail.com and at @ME_Gustafson.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. 

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #SavingtheFront and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
M.E. Gustafson

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #SavingtheFront and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.
You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.
Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!Thanks again,M.E. Gustafson

story:
The story of These Moments of Grief

For many people, the world changed in 2020 but my world changed in 2019 when my mother passed away.

My name is DC and I am the author of These Ordinary Moments of Grief. I wrote this book partly because I was restless to produce something creative from being home often, and partly because I had too many thoughts about my own grief swirling in my head. Sometimes, I would share a few of these thoughts to the virtual world and people seem to like it, literally liking my posts. Still, I have so much more to say, words that can’t all fit on a Facebook post or Instagram caption. This memoir is a collection of my curated musings, memories, and introspection on my loss; all my ordinary moments of grief. These are all the things I learned about myself in my grief and grief itself. Most of all, these are all the ways I miss my mother.

Reading this book may be difficult because it will remind you that one day, you will experience loss. If you’ve already experienced loss, it will remind you of all the ways you’ve lost your person. Nevertheless, I encourage you to read this book to understand what one person's grief is like and to confront the awful truth that grief is here to stay for as long as we continue living in a mortal world and loving mortal people. Don’t worry. You won’t be alone. We will confront it together.

These Ordinary Moments of Grief is not a book that teaches you how to deal with your grief, provides tips or lessons, or prepares you for grief. This book is simply about what it was like for one ordinary person to lose her precious mother. It is dedicated to the grievers and the not yet grievers, for everyone that is curious about grief and anyone that is lonely in their grief.

Ultimately, I hope that These Ordinary Moments of Grief inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:

  • How can I find ways to express my grief? Or talk to grieving people?
  • Why is it so uncomfortable to confront grief in a world full of loss and suffering?
  • How would the world be different, our relationships with one another, if we learn to talk about grief with one another?

I really look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers!

What We Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December, 2021.
  • The Cover Design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The Copyediting for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this winter.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish and a handwritten thank-you note.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”).
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and some excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

Campaign Goals


Standard Tiers:


Tier 1: Hit $5,500 and the ebook/softcover editions get published (this is the minimum needed)
Tier 2: Hit $6,500 and the book will get a hardcover edition
Tier 3: Hit $8,500 and we’ll get an audiobook edition.

About the Author


DC is too shy to share who she is publicly but rest assured, everything in her memoir is true–at least from her perspective and interpretations of events. When she is not creating an alter ego for herself, DC is either working at a nonprofit with the ambitious goal of ending homelessness or serving in the church community she was raised in. She would describe her lifestyle as an introvert living an extroverted life because she is constantly torn between being a homebody and meeting with the people God has blessed her with. Lately, she’s been daydreaming about becoming a Young Adult writer and having a podcast where she analyzes Korean Dramas in-depth.


DC wrote These Ordinary Moments of Grief because she felt misunderstood about her grief and she didn’t know how to talk about her loss with others. This is her first step in overcoming her fears and insecurities about creating dialogue about grief. Before she engages others in these difficult conversations, she wants to first understand what her thoughts and reflections really are. Even though she knows she will never fully understand the complexities of grief, she hopes she’s off to a good start by examining and sharing all her salad days of grief in this memoir.

To get to know DC better, you can stalk her Instagram at @dearsaladdays. The more follows she gets, the more she will post :)

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can support, but that doesn't mean you can't get something out of it!
I will reward the top 3 people who refer the most backers at the end of the campaign (30 days). Here's how:
  1. At the top of the campaign page, you will see the "share" buttons. Click on the "chain" icon to get a custom link just for you. (Note: don't use the URL in the browser window as it won't work to track referrals and you won't get credit ?)
  2. Copy that link and paste it on your social media, email it to a friend, or text a fellow book lover.
  3. When someone clicks on that link and backs the book, you get 1 entry!

Please use #saladdaysofgrief and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts!

Tag: Instragram - @dearsaladdays / @newdegreepress

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
DC

story:
Support Three New Book Projects and Save Up To 62% OFF Limited Edition Hardcovers, Rare Books, Ebooks, Paperbacks, Collectibles and More from Dark Regions Press!

STRETCH GOAL #1 ($24,000) - Number of interior illustrations inside The Cabin at the End of the World Special Edition by Paul Tremblay doubled from 5 to 10. 

UNLOCKED - CAMPAIGN GOAL ($20,000) - If the main campaign goal is reached an entirely new book will be created based on polls/feedback from campaign backers who will get first reservations and a free ebook of the new title!

The Horror Summer Sale of 2019 is here... this time as a crowdfunding campaign to support the creation of three new Dark Regions Press titles! Bundles and grab bags are offered giving discounts up to 62% off retail price exclusively on this page. Each campaign supporter will be listed on Thank You pages inside each of the three new Dark Regions Press titles that this campaign supports!

EXCLUSIVES in the 2019 Horror Summer Sale from Dark Regions Press

* Special early preorders for three brand new Dark Regions Press titles 
* Exclusive bundles that save up to 62% OFF retail price 
* New book to be created if this campaign reaches its goal
* Campaign-exclusive variant covers/signature sheets
* Your name listed in Thank You pages of new titles by supporting campaign

Thank you to everyone who supports this campaign and the creation of three new Dark Regions Press titles, your support means the world!

Three New Titles from Dark Regions Press Available First in This Campaign: 

The Cabin at the End of the World Special Edition by Paul Tremblay

The first-ever USA special edition of Bram Stoker Award-winning novel The Cabin at the End of the World by Paul Tremblay! Available for special early preorder only on this page in a signed & numbered hardcover edition in the HARDCOVER BUNDLE and deluxe signed & lettered traycased hardcover edition in the COLLECTOR'S BUNDLE.

Writing as Life by William F. Nolan

A new collection of fiction, poetry and essays by legendary author William F. Nolan (Logan's Run). Available for special early preorder on this page in ebook (EBOOK BUNDLE), trade paperback (PAPERBACK BUNDLE) and signed & numbered hardcover edition in the HARDCOVER BUNDLE.

Summer of Lovecraft: Cosmic Horror in the 1960s Edited by Brian M. Sammons and Glynn Owen Barrass

A new Lovecraftian anthology based in the 1960s from the editors behind World War Cthulhu: A Collection of Lovecraftian War Stories! Available for special early preorder on this page in ebook (EBOOK BUNDLE).

TABLE OF CONTENTS

  • Night Trippers by Lois H. Gresh
  • Being for the Benefit of Mr. Sullivan by Lee Clark Zumpe
  • Dreamland by David Dunwoody
  • Lost In the Poppy-Fields of Flesh by Konstantine Paradias
  • Five To One by Edward M. Erdelac
  • Keeping the Faith by Sam Stone
  • Mud Men by Sean Hoade
  • Misconception by Jamie D. Jenkins
  • No Colors Anymore by Joe L. Murr
  • Operation Alice by Pete Rawlik
  • Shimmer and Sway by Jayaprakash Satyamurthy
  • Short Wave by Stephen Mark Rainey
  • The Song that Crystal Sang by Tom Lynch
  • Through a Looking Glass Darkly by Glynn Owen Barrass and Brian M. Sammons
  • The Color from the Deep by William Meikle
  • The Long Fine Flash by Edward Morris
  • The Summer of Love by C.J. Henderson
  • Just Another Afternoon in Arkham, Brought to You in Living Color by Mark McLaughlin and Michael Sheehan, Jr.
  • Crystal Blue Persuasion by Jeffrey Thomas

GOALS

CAMPAIGN GOAL ($20,000) - If the main campaign goal is reached an entirely new book will be created based on polls/feedback from campaign backers who will get first reservations and a free ebook of the new title!

STRETCH GOAL #1 (LOCKED) - To be revealed after main campaign goal is reached!

REWARDS

$1 - Cheers! - Thanks for joining our campaign!

$13 - EBOOK BUNDLE - FIVE EBOOKS - Summer of Lovecraft Edited by Brian M. Sammons & Glynn Owen Barrass, Writing as Life by William F. Nolan, Your Choice of Two Ebooks and One Surprise Ebook! Title selections made in post-campaign BackerKit survey. 

$54 - PAPERBACK BUNDLE - FIVE PAPERBACKS - Writing as Life by William F. Nolan, Three Titles of Your Choice and One Surprise Paperback + EBOOK BUNDLE! Free USA shipping. International shipping calculation and title selections made in post-campaign BackerKit survey. 

$117 - HARDCOVER BUNDLE - THREE HARDCOVERS: The Cabin at the End of the World Special Edition by Paul Tremblay Signed & Numbered Hardcover ($75 retail price) + Writing as Life by William F. Nolan Signed & Numbered Hardcover ($75 retail price) both with Campaign-Exclusive Variant Signature Sheets + 1 Surprise Limited Edition Hardcover + EBOOK BUNDLE. Free USA shipping. International shipping in BackerKit survey.

$350 - COLLECTOR'S BUNDLE - FIVE HARDCOVERS - Deluxe Signed & Lettered Traycased Hardcover of The Cabin at the End of the World Special Edition by Paul Tremblay ($325 retail price) + Deluxe Signed & Numbered Slipcased Hardcover of Joshua Hoffine Horror Photography Book ($150 retail price) + HARDCOVER BUNDLE. Free USA shipping. International shipping calculated in post-campaign BackerKit survey.

In Business Since 1985 Dark Regions Press is a Specialty Publisher of Horror, Fantasy and Science Fiction

Dark Regions Press was created in 1985 by Joe Morey and has published hundreds of authors, artists and poets including Clive Barker, Joe R. Lansdale, Joyce Carol Oates, Stephen King, Ramsey Campbell, Neil Gaiman, Thomas Ligotti, Kevin J. Anderson, Bentley Little, Caitlín R. Kiernan and hundreds more. The press has been actively creating specialty books and creative projects for over thirty years and has been featured in publications like FANGORIA, Rue Morgue Magazine, The Huffington Post, The Austin Chronicle, Publishers Weekly, The Library Journal and many more. With a focus on horror and dark fiction, DRP specializes in signed limited edition hardcovers but also publishes ebooks, audiobooks and paperback editions. With over 100 titles actively in print and dozens more planned for future years, Dark Regions Press has received both awards and critical acclaim for its contributions to the dark arts. 

Why an Indiegogo Campaign? 

We knew that we wanted to do something a little different this year for our Horror Summer Sale and the timing aligned perfectly with three new titles being readied for release. This campaign allows for fun goals that could add illustrations to the new titles or even create a new book! We are using the 'Flexible Funding' method so the campaign sale funds will be received even if the goal amount is not reached. The three new titles will be created no matter what, this campaign is just a fun way to launch them for preorder and possibly add more special features!

    Shipping and Fulfillment

    Free shipping to anywhere in the USA. International shipping rates are calculated in our post-campaign BackerKit survey sent within 3 weeks of the campaign ending. Items may ship separately/from different fulfillment providers. Backers outside of the USA that reserve both preorder and in-stock items will have their entire packages shipped once all items are in-stock or international backers can make shipping arrangements with us to have in-stock items shipped first.

    This campaign is using BackerKit to track all backer reservations and allow for ebook/item selections and post-campaign add-ons. It will also be used to calculate and collect international shipping costs. Shipping of in-stock items will begin within 10 business days of receiving answers from all backers in the post-campaign BackerKit survey. The Cabin at the End of the World Special Edition and Writing as Life are both expected to ship by Q1 2020, Summer of Lovecraft ebook will be fulfilled by September 2019. 

    Questions?

    For any questions please do not contact us through Indiegogo but instead e-mail us through our contact form at darkregions.com/contact

    Thank you for supporting independent specialty publishing!

story:
Short Summary

Bigger Than Leadership is a book focused on sharing how life and leadership intersect through stories. These stories will showcase the power of everyday leadership and exemplify what it looks like in our lives.

My name is Brittany Do, and I am the author of Bigger Than Leadership. I wrote this book because oftentimes leadership is limited to certain aspects in life or to select people with traditional leadership positions. I’ll be highlighting how everyone can be an active leader within their own lives.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover that you have more impact than you think. I hope to instill in you the same passion and excitement that I have for intentional leadership and for you to perceive this book as a tool to help you live more intentionally and to think about leadership in a different light.

In this book, you'll learn about life and leadership. Topics include empathy, inspiration, purpose, and so many others. I interviewed 84 people, ranging from students to retired individuals about their leadership experiences. These people include dozens of leaders in their respective industries. You'll hear their stories such as...

  • When a blind woman training for a triathlon encouraged and inspired someone training for the same triathlon
  • How to help someone else even if you don’t have a solution to their problem
  • How a hockey camp taught lifelong lessons bigger than hockey itself

You will love this book if you find people and their stories fascinating, appreciate the small things about life, and enjoy being reminded of what’s truly important.

Bigger Than Leadership is a nonfiction book that speaks to students and professionals who want to look at life and leadership in a different light.

The book is written in 3 parts.

Part 1 establishes the foundation of the book and introduces the idea of influence + intention + inspiration = leadership.

Part 2 elaborates on what the intersections of leadership look like in our everyday lives.

Part 3 is reflective and focuses on what we can be doing to inspire more leadership in our own lives.

There will be stories from over 80 people, ranging from entrepreneurs, podcast hosts, and speakers to high school and college students, authors, and more.

What I Need & What You Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this spring.

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

And much more!

 

The Impact

I'll be donating 75% of the profits from pre-orders above my audio book fundraising goal to World Central Kitchen, a non-profit that provides meals for people after natural disasters.

 

About the Author

Brittany Do is a sophomore at the University of Washington studying Finance and Accounting. She is passionate about people, leadership, and dogs.

She felt compelled to write this book because she believes that the past leadership experiences she’s gained have helped shape the person she is today. After interviewing so many people (about 85!), she realized that she needed to focus on why everyone is inherently a leader. What she hopes for is the book to help spread this perspective and inspire others in the process.

For fun, she likes to read books, and she’s recently gotten into audiobooks after finding out about the app Libby. Of course, she also loves talking to and meeting people. She conducted most of her book interviews over Zoom, and one time she ran into her wall in a hurry, earning a bruise in the process. This didn’t slow her down in writing her book, though, but she did momentarily forget why her elbow was hurting so much.

For more information, you can connect with Brittany at brittanywdo@gmail.com, via LinkedIn at https://www.linkedin.com/in/brittanydo/, and on Instagram at @brittanysbooks.author.
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #BiggerThanLeadership and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.

  • You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via IndieGoGo at the top of the page.

  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

    Thank you so much everyone for of all of your love and support!

    Agape,
    Brittany Do
story_txt:
Short Summary
Bigger Than Leadership is a book focused on sharing how life and leadership intersect through stories. These stories will showcase the power of everyday leadership and exemplify what it looks like in our lives.My name is Brittany Do, and I am the author of Bigger Than Leadership. I wrote this book because oftentimes leadership is limited to certain aspects in life or to select people with traditional leadership positions. I’ll be highlighting how everyone can be an active leader within their own lives.My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover that you have more impact than you think. I hope to instill in you the same passion and excitement that I have for intentional leadership and for you to perceive this book as a tool to help you live more intentionally and to think about leadership in a different light.In this book, you'll learn about life and leadership. Topics include empathy, inspiration, purpose, and so many others. I interviewed 84 people, ranging from students to retired individuals about their leadership experiences. These people include dozens of leaders in their respective industries. You'll hear their stories such as...

When a blind woman training for a triathlon encouraged and inspired someone training for the same triathlon
How to help someone else even if you don’t have a solution to their problem
How a hockey camp taught lifelong lessons bigger than hockey itself

You will love this book if you find people and their stories fascinating, appreciate the small things about life, and enjoy being reminded of what’s truly important.Bigger Than Leadership is a nonfiction book that speaks to students and professionals who want to look at life and leadership in a different light.The book is written in 3 parts.Part 1 establishes the foundation of the book and introduces the idea of influence + intention + inspiration = leadership.Part 2 elaborates on what the intersections of leadership look like in our everyday lives.Part 3 is reflective and focuses on what we can be doing to inspire more leadership in our own lives.There will be stories from over 80 people, ranging from entrepreneurs, podcast hosts, and speakers to high school and college students, authors, and more.

What I Need & What You Get
This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April 2021.
The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this spring.

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.

story:
Hello

My name is Keith Leech, I am aged 65, a retired electronic engineer living in Australia.

I have a keen interest in renewable energy and due to my engineering training and experience I am well qualified to analyze the claims made by promoters of new improved renewal energy inventions (aka Green Widgets).

Back in 2007 I stumbled across a new type of solar collector called the SunBall which promised to deliver amazing performance at a much lower price than anything else on the market. It was featured on the ABC Television program "The New Inventors" and was promised for delivery any day soon.

The inventor Greg Watson was inviting pre-orders from customers and was offering manufacturing/distribution licenses for sale worldwide starting at $1M per territory.

When the deadline for delivery of the SunBall was missed, Watson announced that an improved version called the SunCube would be ready real soon.

I realised that the performance claims made for the SunBall/SunCube were an impossibility and discovered that Greg Watson had a long track record in the Snake Oil industry.

I began an internet campaign using the pen name Keef Wivanef to expose the scam.

Greg Watson became rather annoyed and said rude things about me . He threatened to sue me for defamation and called ME a liar, immoral, unethical and a criminal.

I took HIM to court for defamation and won my case.

I was awarded costs of $50K and damages of $30K

Watson's company Green and Gold Energy went into receivership and Watson has fled the country.

I have been unable to recover any of the money that I am owed.

This makes me a sad panda.

 

 

Short Summary

I have written a book The SunCube Fiasco which has been favourably reviewed by publishers.

The book tells the amazing tragic but funny story of how one con-artist duped investors and government departments out of millions of dollars and went on to cause BILLION dollar losses to shareholders in Emcore USA.

The story is indeed, stranger (and funnier) than fiction and a ripping yarn

I will explain how much damage this and similar scams are doing to the cause of renewable energy by stealing funds which should be going into genuine research and development

 

 

What We Need 

 

The funding is needed to have the book professionally edited and made ready for publication in both E-book and paperback.

The book will need a major marketing campaign to reach a wide audience.

I have a publisher who will do all of this but because the subject may only interest a niche market, and is unlikely to enter the best-selling list I am required to cover some of the up-front costs.

Even though I warned ASIC and other authorities that the SunCube was a scam nothing was done to prevent Watson from stealing millions of dollars.

Despite winning my court battle with Watson I have been unable to recover any of my legal costs or damages. 

The book exposes the legal loophole which allows any unscrupulous businessperson to CLAIM that he has a wonderful new planet saving invention and then trouser the money year after year while he makes excuse after excuse for the delays.

The book is written but needs to be edited and vetted by legal experts. (Green Scam promotors love to make threats of defamation actions)

 

& What You Get

Rewards include warm fuzzy feelings for helping Keef.

An E-book which you won't be able to switch off.

Perks include all of the above AND you will be able to argue with me online.

If I don't reach my goal then you'll still get the book, I'll carry on moaning on the internet forums as usual.

The Impact

Crowd funding is an excellent idea.....BUT!!!

How do you keep the unscrupulous operators/con-artists out.

The SunCube confidence scam pre-dates crowd-funding but the tried and proven Green Widget Scam is even easier nowadays.

If you read this story you will understand that the net has expanded the reaches of sociopathic con-artists.

I am working to have the law  changed to so that scammers no longer enjoy the presumtion of innocence defense.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Cool!
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Try to remember........... what was that again?

And that’s all there is to it.


Whooo Hoooo!

story:
After years of writing for magazines and writing my own books, ALL NINE OF THEM, my computer is finally ready to call it quits. As a self-published writer, I need every cent I can get to meet my day to day needs. Without a computer to continue my writing, the GIMP book series may be stalled.

I'm asking friends, family, readers and supporters to take some time out and please donate some funds to help me put together a respectable computer, so I can continue writing my film fanzine WENG'S CHOP and continue the GIMP book series for cult cinema lovers around the world.

Whatever you can give would be deeply appreciated, whether that be $1 or $100. Hopefully...it is $100.

Here are a list of my books CURRENTLY selling!

FILMBRAWL: http://www.lulu.com/us/en/shop/brian-harris/filmbrawl/paperback/product-14736108.html

GIMP VOL.1: http://www.amazon.com/Gimp-The-Rapening-Volume-Uno/dp/1468162993/

GIMP VOL.2: http://www.amazon.com/Gimp-The-Rapening-Volume-Deux/dp/1478135395/

GIMP VOL.3: http://www.amazon.com/Gimp-The-Rapening-Volume-Tre/dp/1480221155/

WENG'S CHOP #0: http://www.amazon.com/Wengs-Chop-0-Brian-Harris/dp/1478306254/

WENG'S CHOP #1: http://www.amazon.com/Wengs-Chop-1-Volume/dp/1479332585/

story:
My Story

HELLO EVERYONE

My name Is Michael John. Two years ago I began to start following my dreams, and decided to really start to write that book that I wanted to write. I finally wrote it, and through hard work, and a lot of researching I decided to take all the money that I've earned and self publish my book. I can say now that My book, Negative = Positive will be out March 5th, 2012. My book is an inspirational book, to help everyone, all ages, races, and demographics. My purpose is to spread the word of my book, so people across the world will be encouraged to follow their dreams. I've worked three jobs for three years to raise the funds to self publish my book.


The Impact

If I raise the money, It will be enough for me to "book" a desired venue,and will allow me to have an Official Book release party. The party will allow other young artist, such as singers, actors, poets, ect... of my city (Newark, De) to be showcased. This event  will showcase some parts of my book, such as, showing people that among all the negativity, there are so much more young people like myself, who are striving to achieve their goals and dreams.


What I Need & What You Get

$2,500 is the goal. "The hall of Elegance", party planning, catering, decorations, photos, sound, and the helping hands, cause for a budget of $2,500. If I don't get all what is needed here,we will do a fund raiser at our local Red Robin, where if you come out and eat, 10% of your bill will be donated to the event. If I receive the a total of $2,500, and so happen don't need all of the funds, we will donate the rest to a charity. Being that my book is an advocate for suicide victims, we will find the best charity that supports this. There isn't any donation to small, or too big. I will accept anything low as $1.00 (US).  Depending on your contribution, you may receive a free copy of my Book, signed with a personal message, and other small promotional items.


Other Ways You Can Help

You can visits my blog, at www.MikeOJohn.blogspot.com . There you can get to learn a little more about me through my writings. If you have another questions and would like to contact me directly. Email me at MikeOJohn1@yahoo.com
